quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.quest_desc3: &eModerators&r vary in efficiency, but usually more rarer or more expensive blocks and fluids have better stats than common or cheap ones.
quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.quest_desc5: A &dReactor&r multiblock will not form if an invalid &eModerator&r is placed inside it.
quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.title: &eModerators
quest.18C8FF073435FB10.quest_desc1: By having access to the &dAmadron Tablet&r, you can buy a &aPCB Blueprint&r and make yourself your first &bUV Light Box&r!
quest.18C8FF073435FB10.quest_desc3: This is is needed to expose &bEmpty PCB's&r to &bUV Light&r, which is an important process for assembling PCBs.
quest.18C8FF073435FB10.quest_desc5: You can make Empty PCBs in the &dPressure Chamber&r.
quest.18C8FF073435FB10.title: &fMaking Circuit Boards!
quest.18CD33B0D1C0D3E6.quest_desc1: The &aCrop Support&r will work to increase the growth speed of any trees or crops that are planted on it.
quest.18CD33B0D1C0D3E6.quest_desc3: These are pretty cheap and require no upkeep to use, making them really useful for farming!
quest.18CD33B0D1C0D3E6.title: &fFaster Farming!
quest.1953C2127633B6D7.quest_desc1: &6无线通用终端&r可以一个顶许多类别的终端用。
quest.1953C2127633B6D7.quest_desc3: 把你的无线合成终端和别的无线终端一块合成，就比如&a无线样板管理终端&r之类的终端即可。
quest.1953C2127633B6D7.title: &6无线通用终端
quest.1962F37154380EBF.quest_desc1: The &aFermenter&r is a &bHeavy Machine&r used to extract &aEthanol&r from fruits, grains, and vegetables.
quest.1962F37154380EBF.quest_desc3: Make sure to check out the &bEngineer's Manual&r to help you build the multiblock!
quest.1962F37154380EBF.title: &fFermenter
quest.19762D55D6AD8908.quest_desc1: The Strainer seems to have caught some &2Saplings&r that were floating by.
quest.19762D55D6AD8908.quest_desc3: If I had some &aDirt&r to plant these in, I could figure out a way to extract minerals from some of these blocks I have.
quest.19762D55D6AD8908.quest_desc5: For whatever reason, the Saplings respond to me squatting over and over. Maybe they like dancing?
quest.19762D55D6AD8908.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Gather &2Wooden Logs&r by planting Saplings in Dirt.
quest.19762D55D6AD8908.quest_desc9: Note: Twerking to grow things requires holding a &aHoe&r in one of your hands.
quest.19762D55D6AD8908.title: A Floating Tree
quest.1980C42D8CDBE51C.quest_desc1: The &6Powered Spawner&r is a powered version of the vanilla mob spawner.
quest.1980C42D8CDBE51C.quest_desc11: Note: The recipe for this can be found in JEI by hitting &eU&r on a Broken Spawner in your inventory.
quest.1980C42D8CDBE51C.quest_desc3: The mob is spawns is based on the &aBroken Spawner&r used to craft it. &aBroken Spawners can be acquired by breaking a vanilla Minecraft Spawner.
quest.1980C42D8CDBE51C.quest_desc5: A &aBroken Spawner&r will retain the mob type of the original spawner, but can also be changed by combining it with a &6Filled Soul Vial&r of the desired mob type in a &aSoul Binder&r.
quest.1980C42D8CDBE51C.quest_desc7: When powered, it will spawn mobs up to 4 blocks away from the machine.
quest.1980C42D8CDBE51C.quest_desc9: Just like most powered machines, it can be upgraded by installing higher tier &aConduits&r.
quest.1980C42D8CDBE51C.title: &fPowered Spawner
quest.19874DF48B8B2A75.quest_desc1: Combining &dAtomic Alloys&r with &9Elite Control Circuits&r can upgrade them to &6Ultimate Control Circuits&r.
quest.19874DF48B8B2A75.quest_desc3: These are used to craft the highest tier pipes, factories, and the most advanced machinery.
quest.19874DF48B8B2A75.title: &dUltimate Control Circuit
quest.19BD1DF4EFF584A6.quest_desc1: When using a &cBlazegold Hoe&r to till dirt, you'll create &cBlazebloom Soil&r.
quest.19BD1DF4EFF584A6.quest_desc3: This soil is faster than the previous tier soil, but also &bautoharvests&r fully grown crops by itself.
quest.19BD1DF4EFF584A6.quest_desc5: When this happens, the items will only stay in the world for about 2 seconds! Make sure to collect them using an &aItem Collector&r.
quest.19BD1DF4EFF584A6.title: &cBlazegold Hoe
quest.1A183C6EA50C9ADF.title: &fSilver Banding
quest.1A3C52B662D8237B.quest_desc1: With the power of &9Blue Chalk&r, you are capable of drawing &6Fatma's Incentivized Attraction&r to summon and bind &6Marids&r to your will.
quest.1A3C52B662D8237B.title: &6Fatma's Incentivized Attraction
quest.1A43F480970FEBBB.quest_desc1: The &dEclipse Alloy Hoe&r can create the ultimate tier of farmland: &5Shadowpulse Soil&r.
quest.1A43F480970FEBBB.quest_desc3: This farmland is faster than all previous tiers, as well as retaining all previous abilities like autoharvesting.
quest.1A43F480970FEBBB.title: &5Eclipse Alloy Hoe
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc1: 拿着&a法术书&r，然后按下&aC&r键就会打开构建咒语的目录，你可以在里头构建你的第一个咒语！
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc11: 接着深入了解一下这个界面吧！
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc13: 右边的数字是你已经有的咒语数量，左边则是改变咒语的颜色和声效之类的效果！这个界面在看你储存的&d使魔&r时也会出现。
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc15: 现在退出这个界面，然后就可以用你刚刚写的咒语隔空破坏方块了！不过你目前为止还不能破坏像&9黑曜石&r这样的坚硬方块，必须在这个咒语后加一个&d强化&r才行。
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc17: 现在就想加强化？你需要先学会这个&d魔符&r！
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc5: 此处为了教学，请编写一个&e弹射物-破坏&r咒语！
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc7: 咒语施放是按照特定顺序执行魔符的，法术开头必须是&b形态&r魔符。形态魔符是法术释放的对象，比如在法术编写界面你有触摸、弹射物和自身可选。单击选择&a弹射物&r形态，然后下栏中就会开始法术构建。
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.quest_desc9: 接下来，你需要为法术挑选一种&e效果&r，即想让这个法术执行什么效果。目前为止你只知道破坏和伤害，选择破坏后它就会添加进下方咒语栏中。之后你可以给你的法术随意起名，最后点击保存即可。界面下方的&a魔力条&r可以显示该咒语消耗的&9魔力&r。
quest.1A6984A6484FF8F3.title: &f构建第一个&d咒语
quest.1A89ACDC528588D5.title: &dCelestigem Chestplate
quest.1A984CF299959C96.quest_desc1: The &aCharger&r is used to charge or fill items and equipment up using power or &cTurbofuel&r.
quest.1A984CF299959C96.title: &fThe &aCharger&r
quest.1AA08B095A8B378F.quest_desc1: If you plan on creating a &aDrawer Wall&r, you'll need to make the &6Linking Tool&r!
quest.1AA08B095A8B378F.quest_desc3: The &6Linking Tool&r is used to link drawers to a &aStorage Controller&r, or to link separate &dEnder Drawers&r together. For more on how to use it, check the next page!
quest.1AA08B095A8B378F.quest_desc5: By default, this tool is set to link a single drawer at a time. To do this, first sneak-use the tool on a Controller, then use the tool on the drawer you wish to add to the Controller's network.
quest.1AA08B095A8B378F.quest_desc7: You'll also see the range that the Controller can reach when you hover over it with the tool in hand. This can be upgraded with Storage Upgrades!
quest.1AA08B095A8B378F.quest_desc9: While looking into the air, using the tool will switch between adding or removing drawers. If you sneak-use the tool in the air, it will switch between adding a single drawer at a time, or multiple!
quest.1AA08B095A8B378F.title: &fLinking Drawers
quest.1ABA5F2ECAA6D9D2.quest_desc1: &a通用机械&r的物流线缆和管道是这个包里头最好的管线！已经放在地上的管线可以直接升级，而且这些管线都有内部缓存。
quest.1ABA5F2ECAA6D9D2.quest_desc3: 虽然比如&aPipez&r模组来说，这些管线制作和升级都没那么容易，不过它们的传输速度和适用性更高。
quest.1ABA5F2ECAA6D9D2.quest_desc5: 请使用&d配置器&r来配置管道和线缆。配置器就是通用机械的&a扳手&r，而且还有很多有用的功能。
quest.1ABA5F2ECAA6D9D2.quest_desc7: 移步&a通用机械&r章节，深入了解这个工具！
quest.1ABA5F2ECAA6D9D2.title: &a通用机械
quest.1AF177BD838F7F69.title: &fVibrant Capacitor Bank
quest.1AF853BD7AFAF0C6.quest_desc1: This upgrade will increase the efficency of chemical-based machines.
quest.1AF853BD7AFAF0C6.title: &fChemical Upgrade
quest.1AF8DB4E0B3BE3ED.quest_desc1: I seem to have forgotten the ever growing hunger of the Goo I made...
quest.1AF8DB4E0B3BE3ED.quest_desc3: It's almost like its stomach is just an empty void that is always growing.
quest.1AF8DB4E0B3BE3ED.quest_desc5: Maybe that's it! Feed it something from the Void!
quest.1AF8DB4E0B3BE3ED.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Using the &6Mixer&r, mix &cBlazebloom Goo&r with an &dAbyssal Pearl&r and &bPolymorphic Fluid&r to create &dVoidshimmer Goo&r.
quest.1AF8DB4E0B3BE3ED.quest_desc9: Note: You will need 2 Aquatic Catalysts to power the Mixer.
quest.1B3B2B9697D7AEA6.quest_desc1: Combines all of the best tools you can make into one!
quest.1B3B2B9697D7AEA6.title: &5Eclipse Alloy Paxel
quest.1B9C122BAE5A64BC.quest_desc1: &cDemonic Partners&r are a nice way to get rid of that feeling of loneliness.
quest.1B9C122BAE5A64BC.quest_desc3: They will keep you company, cook for you, and extend your potion effects.
quest.1B9C122BAE5A64BC.title: &cLove at First Summon?
quest.1BC0E8258FBDBF56.title: &cIhagan's Enthrallment Animals
quest.1BE00286EDFBF416.quest_desc1: The pebbles are definitely starting to add up quickly.
quest.1BE00286EDFBF416.quest_desc3: With enough of them, I believe I can create a place to make &aCharcoal&r from the spare wood I've gathered.
quest.1BE00286EDFBF416.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Gather enough stone pebbles to create a &aFurnace&r to make &aCharcoal&r.
quest.1C044AAAA1306C6F.title: &dFamiliar &fBeds
quest.1C58933205E5C96D.quest_desc1: Once you've set up some basic &bSteam Power&r, this can only carry you so far!
quest.1C58933205E5C96D.quest_desc3: This chapter shows many of the other methods of generating power within Oceanblock 2.
quest.1C58933205E5C96D.quest_desc5: Note: Most quests in this chapter are locked behind their respective dependency quests from the main questline.
quest.1C58933205E5C96D.title: Moving From Steam Power
quest.1C65FB6D312F1287.title: {"text": "基础物流管道", "color": "#5EFCB6"}
quest.1C90DD17A67CAAE2.quest_desc1: I don't believe I can use the &cLava&r directly, but I should definitely keep a lookout for magma-infused stone.
quest.1C90DD17A67CAAE2.quest_desc3: I should be able use the heat-resistant properties of the block to create some sort of oven.
quest.1C90DD17A67CAAE2.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Find a &cMagma Block&r and break it down into &6Magma Droplets&r.
quest.1C90DD17A67CAAE2.title: Molten Magma
quest.1CA7E96F42B75C2F.quest_desc1: One of the first machines that you can make is the &aPowered Furnace&r!
quest.1CA7E96F42B75C2F.quest_desc3: To build this machine, place down the Powered Furnace block first, then place a &bMachine Core&r on top of it. Then you can right click it to build it.
quest.1CA7E96F42B75C2F.quest_desc5: This is a decent machine in the early game, but can be upgraded to be much faster using &bAddons&r.
quest.1CA7E96F42B75C2F.title: &fThe &aPowered Furnace
quest.1CAA9A2F7F3EDAD3.title: {"text": "Pink Chalk", "color": "#FCB1D0"}
quest.1CAC300C14A023BB.quest_desc1: The &6Ritual of Summon Wilden&r can be augmented to summon the boss of Ars Nouveau: The &5Wilden Chimera&r.
quest.1CAC300C14A023BB.quest_desc3: To summon this boss, you'll need to first use a &2Tablet of Summon Wilden&r on a Ritual Brazier. Before you activate the ritual, augment it by using 1 of each of the Wilden mob drops: 1 Wing, 1 Horn, and 1 Spike. Now you can activate the ritual with an empty hand, and summon in the Wilden Chimera!
quest.1CAC300C14A023BB.title: &fWilden Tribute
quest.1CB4BF0907316518.title: &cBlazegold Leggings
quest.1CB65FAEA9125163.quest_desc1: With the &aEnrichment Chamber&r, we can give it diamonds to make &9Enriched Diamonds&r.
quest.1CB65FAEA9125163.quest_desc3: This is an important material that we'll use to create stronger alloys for better circuits and gear!
quest.1CB65FAEA9125163.title: &bDiamond Infusions
quest.1CD21F10064581B4.title: &aGreen Chalk
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.quest_desc1: Just as a recap so we don't get lost, a Tier 3 chain looks like this!
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.quest_desc11: 5. The 4 Ore Dusts are then smelted into 4 Ingots.
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.quest_desc13: This means for every 1 raw ore you send into the chain, you'll get a return of 4 ingots.
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.quest_desc3: 1. 1 Raw Ore goes into a &aChemical Injection Chamber&r to be broken down into 4 Ore Shards. This machine is being fed either Hydrogen Chloride or Salt.
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.quest_desc5: 2. The 4 Ore Shards go into a Purification Chamber, which turns into 4 Ore Clumps. The Chamber needs Oxygen to do this!
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.quest_desc7: 3. The 4 Ore Clumps are then sent into a Crusher, where they are crushed into 4 Dirty Dusts.
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.quest_desc9: 4. The 4 Dirty Dusts are sent to an Enrichment Chamber, which is then purified into 4 Ore Dusts.
quest.1CEA8C4CF222E70B.title: &dTier 3 Ore Processing
quest.1CFEC4265CAAA0D8.quest_desc1: &bWatering Cans&r are pretty simple. Fill it with water first by sneak using it on water, then hold right click to use it over an area. You can also sneak use it while looking into the air to use it automatically when held.
quest.1CFEC4265CAAA0D8.quest_desc3: The higher the tier, the more area that it covers. Usually these are automated by placing them in auto-clickers.
quest.1CFEC4265CAAA0D8.title: &aInferium &fWatering Can
quest.1D410DFB7EFEE4CE.quest_desc1: &aCoffee Beans&r can be found in the wild, and can be harvested to make &aCoffee&r.
quest.1D410DFB7EFEE4CE.title: &fCoffee Beans
quest.1DA78BAB2A6E2C82.quest_desc1: &a末影IO&r模组对于那些“身经百战”的整合包玩家来说，留下最深刻印象的就是它的&d导管&r。
quest.1DA78BAB2A6E2C82.quest_desc3: 这些&d导管&r可以随心所欲配置，甚至一个方块空间内可以放置多个导管。如果你不喜欢这玩意的样子的话，就往上面贴个&a导管框架&r吧！
quest.1DA78BAB2A6E2C82.quest_desc5: 调节这些管道需要&a以太扳手&r，如果你把管道放在了导管框架下，但是又想调整这个管道的话，拿着以太扳手就可以隐藏导管框架，轻松调整。
quest.1DA78BAB2A6E2C82.title: &b末影接口
quest.1DCCF9A58A557282.quest_desc1: With &6Marid Essence&r, you can now craft &9Blue Chalk&r.
quest.1DCCF9A58A557282.quest_desc3: This is used to upgrade your existing &bPentacles&r to the next tier.
quest.1DCCF9A58A557282.title: &9Blue Chalk
quest.1DD0C33438447DD7.quest_desc1: Everything in this dimension burns &cextremely hot&r.
quest.1DD0C33438447DD7.quest_desc3: If I could somehow harness that heat, I could use it to make the &bTempered Glass Jars&r burn even hotter!
quest.1DD0C33438447DD7.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Find &bSoul Sand&r within the &cLava Dimension&r. Use &bSoul Flames&r to Superheat your Tempered Glass Jars.
quest.1DD0C33438447DD7.quest_desc7: This can be done either by igniting Soul Sand, or by creating a &bSoul Campfire&r.
quest.1DD0C33438447DD7.title: &cSuperheated&r
quest.1DFA884DAB026DCA.title: &fLead Banding
quest.1E39AB995B86D47A.quest_desc1: By applying a &bPolyethylene&r layer to your &aBasic Pressure Tubes&r, you're able to upgrade them to &2Reinforced Pressure Tubes&r, allowing them to handle up to 10 &bBAR&r of pressure!
quest.1E39AB995B86D47A.quest_desc3: &cMake sure to balance your pressure system accordingly&r.
quest.1E39AB995B86D47A.title: &fReinforced Pressure Tubes
quest.1E7FCA66EDB1BCF5.quest_desc1: &aAquarine Steel Tools&r are unbreakable tools with special abilities.
quest.1E7FCA66EDB1BCF5.quest_desc3: To infuse a tool, you will need to infuse it with &bAquatic power&r in a &aCharger&r. You will also need to drop it in some &aEAS&r, which will consume a full bucket to activate the powers.
quest.1E7FCA66EDB1BCF5.quest_desc5: Shift + Right-clicking an infused tool will activate its special ability, which can be found on their tooltip.
quest.1E7FCA66EDB1BCF5.title: &cAquarine Steel Tools
quest.1E95AD23243FEF87.quest_desc1: 现在你就可以制造&6实用拓展&r模组中的最强燃料！只需动动手把&a充能油菜种子&r丢进&c晶化油&r里头，然后&d充能油&r就会duang的一下出现啦！
quest.1E95AD23243FEF87.title: &f充能油菜籽
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.quest_desc1: &9Otherworld&r ores usually can only be mined with &9Otherworld&r metal tools.
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.quest_desc3: The &aInfused Pickaxe&r is a makeshift solution to this problem.
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.quest_desc5: Brittle &aSpirit Attuned Gems&r house a &cDjinni&r that allows harvesting the ores, but the durability is extremely low.
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.title: &cInfused Pickaxe
quest.1EBD69E2E7CEE693.quest_desc1: I can’t see it, but I can feel it...
quest.1EBD69E2E7CEE693.quest_desc10: The whispers aren’t just whispers anymore. They’re voices. Clear. Sharp. And they keep saying the same thing: Turn back.
quest.1EBD69E2E7CEE693.quest_desc3: The air hums like a live wire, shadows stretch in directions they have no business stretching, and the whole place has that “being watched” energy. It doesn’t speak. Doesn’t move.
quest.1EBD69E2E7CEE693.quest_desc9: The deeper I go, the weirder things get; like the Rift itself is paying attention. Time stutters, space bends, and that presence? It’s getting stronger. Whatever it is, it’s tied to this place. And it’s guarding something. Something I need.
quest.1EBD69E2E7CEE693.title: Log Entry 014
quest.1ED582363F67CF8C.quest_desc1: To craft &dRidiculite&r, insert two &5Ludicrite&r ingots and one ingot's worth of &bLiquid &5Magentite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.1ED582363F67CF8C.quest_desc3: You'll need a &6Fluidizer&r built to &eSolid Mode&r to get &bLiquid &5Magentite&r.
quest.1ED582363F67CF8C.title: &dRidiculite
quest.1EE32B2BE71B90AE.quest_desc1: Several of these underwater structures are covered in some sort of... ancient &ogoo&r?
quest.1EE32B2BE71B90AE.quest_desc3: Speaking of Goo... maybe I can use it to upgrade my Goo!
quest.1EE32B2BE71B90AE.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Acquire &dSculk&r from one of the structures underwater.
quest.1EE32B2BE71B90AE.quest_desc7: Note: This will require using some type of &dSilk Touch&r.
quest.1EE32B2BE71B90AE.title: Ancient...Goo?
quest.1EFED5AC265CDB0C.quest_desc1: Before having a &aMetal Press&r, you will need to craft plates by combining an ingot with an &aEngineer's Hammer&r in a crafting table.
quest.1EFED5AC265CDB0C.quest_desc3: To craft wires, combine a plate with &aWire Cutters&r in the same way.
quest.1EFED5AC265CDB0C.title: &fMetal Plates \&\ Wires
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc1: Items with unique properties (NBT Data), such as damaged or enchanted equipment will take up one item type for each variation.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc10: When extracting items, however, it is recommended to use a &7Foliot Transporter&r, even if it only places the items inside a chest next to the &aStorage Actuator&r.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc12: This is because, when extracting a specific item from the &aStorage Actuator&r, most pipes will cycle through every single stored item one by one, massively impacting game performance, especially on servers.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc3: For example, two wooden swords with two different damage values will take up two item types.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc5: Other mods can access the storage controller just like a shulker box, but some mods may struggle to read stack sizes.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc8: When inserting items, the &aStorage Actuator&r will maximize performance automatically, minimizing impact on game performance.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.title: &fNBT Tags \&\ Storage Logistics
quest.1F2E5FBD59466D57.quest_desc1: &a流体模块&r可以将周边的流体当水处理，前提是路由器中必须有流体类储存容器，比如&a桶&r，或者&a储罐&r。
quest.1F2E5FBD59466D57.quest_desc3: 装有&a流体模块 MK.1&r的路由器可以和临近方块互动，请在模块UI中进行配置。
quest.1F2E5FBD59466D57.quest_desc5: &a流体模块 Mk.2&r可以无线传输流体，同时拥有分配模块的功能。
quest.1F2E5FBD59466D57.quest_desc7: 如果想要升级流体传输速率，你可以选择给路由器安装一个&a流体传输升级&r。&a速度升级&r可以提升流体输入输出的频率，也很值得安装。
quest.1F2E5FBD59466D57.title: &f掌控流体
quest.1F6FE0AAF690665D.quest_desc1: 你可以制造各种各样的&a路由器升级&r，这些升级可以让你的自动化之路更顺利一点。
quest.1F6FE0AAF690665D.quest_desc3: - &a速度升级&r提升路由器执行已安装模块的频率。
quest.1F6FE0AAF690665D.quest_desc5: - &a堆栈升级&r可以提升路由器处理一组物品的效率，不用再一个一个物品慢吞吞地处理了。
quest.1F6FE0AAF690665D.quest_desc7: 如果你想要升级你的模块的话，不能用升级，得用&a拓展核心&r。
quest.1F6FE0AAF690665D.title: &f通用路由器升级
quest.1F88FD3D0365F788.title: &fFerricore Shovel
quest.1F8EC3339B8873B9.quest_desc1: The &aXP Obelisk&r is one of the best ways to store your experience, especially when combined with the &aXP Vacuum&r.
quest.1F8EC3339B8873B9.quest_desc3: It allows you to store and pull levels from its tank one level at a time, ten levels at a time, or all at once.
quest.1F8EC3339B8873B9.title: &fXP Obelisk
quest.1F9E582F684EA247.quest_desc1: The &aMixer&r is a &bHeavy Machine&r that dissolves and mixes solids into fluids.
quest.1F9E582F684EA247.quest_desc3: The most common uses are &aLiquid Concrete&r, &aRedstone Acid&r, or &dLiquid Potions&r.
quest.1F9E582F684EA247.title: &fMixer
quest.1FBEA2EB39456FD5.title: {"text": "Basic Chemical Tank", "color": "#5EFCB6"}
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc1: With &bSilicon&r, I can create some basic electronic components that should get me started with generating power.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc11: Machines from &6Oritech&r are multiblocks that use &aMachine Cores&r to finish building them. By placing the machine itself down, you can right click on it to see where the &aMachine Cores&r must be placed. Right clicking with machine cores will automatically place them down.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc13: At this stage, you have access to the first 3 tiers of Machine Cores. You can learn more about these in the &6Oritech Chapter&r.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc15: Each multiblock machine will need a specific amount of Machine Cores to complete them.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc17: Start by building the Magmatic Boiler, then attaching the Steam Boiler Addon to the back of it.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc19: Pump in water into one of the sides of the Steam Boiler Addon, and Lava into the Boiler itself.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc21: This will cause the Boiler to generate steam, which can then be pumped out of the other side of the Steam Boiler Addon and into the &6Steam Engine&r.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc23: Once you've pumped steam into the &6Steam Engine&r, it will generate excess water that needs to be pumped out or the machine will eventually stop!
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc3: The Lava Dimension has nearly infinite Lava, right?
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc5: I should aim to create a machine that mixes the lava with water to create &bSteam&r, then harness that &bsteam&r to generate power.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Create a &cMagmatic Boiler&r and attach a &bSteam Boiler Addon&r to it. Craft a &6Steam Engine&r and create a setup to generate basic steam power.
quest.1FD9B331E6CD9BDE.title: It's Time For Some Power
quest.1FE952E6D58451EA.quest_desc1: With Magebloom, we can craft &aSpell Parchment&r for us to inscribe our spells on!
quest.1FE952E6D58451EA.quest_desc3: To inscribe a spell onto a &aBlank Parchment&r, use the parchment on your &aScribe's Table&r. Select the spell you'd like to inscribe in your Spell Book, then sneak-right click onto the parchment to set the spell!
quest.1FE952E6D58451EA.quest_desc5: These &aBlank Parchments&r can also be used to create item filters to help with automation, as well as making &dWarp Scrolls&r!
quest.1FE952E6D58451EA.title: &fTranscribing Our &dSpells
quest.1FEEBCA6D633B479.quest_desc1: &aEnder Storage&r allows for cross-dimensional storage of items and fluids.
quest.1FEEBCA6D633B479.quest_desc3: &aEnder Chests&r link their inventories to others with matching color patterns. You can use any colored dye on the wool pads to change its color.
quest.1FEEBCA6D633B479.quest_desc5: &aEnder Pouches&r allow you to remotely access an &aEnder Chest&r of the same color pattern. Right-clicking the pouch on any &aEnder Chest&r will change the pouch's color to match that of the chest.
quest.1FEEBCA6D633B479.quest_desc7: &aEnder Tanks&r work in the same way as &aEnder Chests&r but store liquids instead of items.
quest.1FEEBCA6D633B479.quest_desc9: Using a &bDiamond&r on the latch of an &aEnder Chest&r will move it to a seperate private network for the player that used the diamond. This is especially good for server use.
quest.1FEEBCA6D633B479.title: &aEnder Storage
quest.2061FEEF44253E13.title: &f物品卡
quest.206987FC6B1524F8.quest_desc1: &a原子再构机&r是&6实用拓展&r的主要机器，一般拿来做晶体材料。
quest.206987FC6B1524F8.quest_desc3: 给它供应足够的能量（CF）后，它就会射出一道长10格的激光，假如有方块则激光会被挡住。
quest.206987FC6B1524F8.quest_desc5: 它会把激光路径上的所有掉落物材料，或者放置的方块全部转化。
quest.206987FC6B1524F8.title: &f原子再构器
quest.207CE761F35EB902.quest_desc1: The &aCrafting Components &bBlueprint&r will be your most used &bBlueprint&r.
quest.207CE761F35EB902.quest_desc3: This &bBlueprint&r allows you to craft the most common items used in creating more advanced machines.
quest.207CE761F35EB902.title: &fCrafting Components &bBlueprint
quest.208A53545D649C8D.quest_desc1: Machines from this mod can be upgraded using &aMachine Upgrades&r!
quest.208A53545D649C8D.quest_desc3: Each tier increases the stats of the machine, and can be seen in the tooltip by holding shift while hovering the upgrade.
quest.208A53545D649C8D.title: &aMachine Upgrades&r
quest.20AC15DC1E6E47D7.quest_desc1: This upgrade works just like the Smelter upgrade, and allows you to autosmelt mob drops when installed.
quest.20AC15DC1E6E47D7.title: &fUpgrade: Smoker
quest.20CC7D7B65AE1BB4.title: &5Eclipse Alloy Helmet
quest.210E56AC8F66C19E.quest_desc1: The &aExperience Solidifier&r uses the player's experience and turns it into &aSolidified Experience&r.
quest.210E56AC8F66C19E.quest_desc3: &aSolidified Experience&r contains XP, which can be consumed by right-clicking (sneaking will consume a full stack).
quest.212155506A40BA41.quest_desc1: &dFluxite&r is a crystal that is specifically designed to allow perfect flow of electricity.
quest.212155506A40BA41.quest_desc3: That's what I'd say if I wanted to sound like I know what I am talking about. I'm just guessing at this point.
quest.212155506A40BA41.quest_desc5: Installing one of these into a circuit board might allow me to control exactly how my suit responds to pressure.
quest.212600F8D3C1E1EB.quest_desc1: To make the best power storage in &aMekanism&r, we'll need to convert Lithium into &6Lithium Dust&r using a &aChemical Crystallizer&r. The Crystallizer requires &dUltimate Control Circuits&r to craft!
quest.212600F8D3C1E1EB.title: &dLithium Dust
quest.212F163A18A332A1.quest_desc1: &aEmpowered Palis Crystals&r are used to create &aGreenhouse Glass&r, which can be extremely useful as a roof above your farm.
quest.212F163A18A332A1.title: &fEmpowered Palis Crystal
quest.2137D5491D1AAF0D.quest_desc1: There are many different blocks that can be used to enhance or improve the automation, maintenance, and performance of your &dReactors&r.
quest.2137D5491D1AAF0D.quest_desc3: For a full list, open your &aExtreme Book&r, then go to &dThe Reactor&r section. You will then see three blocks on the left page of the book, the one on the right is what you are looking for.
quest.2137D5491D1AAF0D.title: &dReactor &fParts
quest.215E7EB95A7C64A3.quest_desc1: Every second matters, and that's why you should shove them in the &6Temporal Pouch&r.
quest.215E7EB95A7C64A3.quest_desc3: This pouch stores time, as long as it is in your inventory. This time can be used to increase the ticks of pretty much anything by sneak-using the pouch on it.
quest.215E7EB95A7C64A3.quest_desc5: If something is too slow, use some of your stored time to make it faster!
quest.215E7EB95A7C64A3.title: Time In A Pouch
quest.2160C6D61B76C8FE.quest_desc1: &6Occultism's&r upgradeable storage system allows you to store your items in a separate dimension of &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.2160C6D61B76C8FE.quest_desc3: Don't worry about them floating away in the void though, we have insurance for that.
quest.2160C6D61B76C8FE.title: &eMagical Storage
quest.21723F4B52A69BE9.quest_desc1: The &aDrone Port&r allows you to transport items across vast distances using flying drones. It requires a &aDrone Port&r at both the takeoff and landing positions to be built and powered.
quest.21723F4B52A69BE9.quest_desc3: Once built, assign the target port using a &eTarget Designator&r. Bind it to the targeted &aDrone Port&r by shift + right-clicking the target port. Then, on the port you wish to send items from, open the UI and place the &eTarget Designator&r into the special item slot.
quest.21723F4B52A69BE9.quest_desc5: The target &aDrone Port&r must be at least 50 blocks away, and the area it's in needs to be chunk-loaded.
quest.21723F4B52A69BE9.quest_desc7: A &aDrone Port&r can only send items to one target port, but can receive items from multiple ports. However, each drone takes a few seconds to land, so if items arrive too frequently, one receiving port may be overloaded when targeted by multiple ports.
quest.21723F4B52A69BE9.quest_desc9: The time it takes to deliver items is constant, regardless of the distance the drone has to fly. However, the energy cost increases with distance.
quest.21BB7CE008421132.quest_desc1: If I want to be able to break up metals into dusts, I'll need to use something that is powered.
quest.21BB7CE008421132.quest_desc3: Have you ever tried turning a metal ingot into dust with just a hammer? It doesn't work so well.
quest.21BB7CE008421132.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Craft a &6Pulverizer&r to efficiently process materials into dusts.
quest.21BB7CE008421132.title: Powered Pulverizing
quest.21E22024A842E46E.quest_desc1: Want to shut your machines up from making noise? Try some of these upgrades!
quest.21E22024A842E46E.title: &fMuffling Upgrade
quest.21E8659A60134C9B.title: &fBucket of Redstone Acid
quest.2262994A5B54AE0D.title: &fGold Banding
quest.22878CFA5B7B90AD.quest_desc1: The &6Chemical Crystallizer&r converts a gas into a crystallized item. This has several uses, such as creating &aLithium Dust&r or creating &dAntimatter Pellets&r.
quest.22878CFA5B7B90AD.quest_desc3: For the purpose of the ore processing chain, this will take 1 bucket of Clean Ore Slurry and turn it into 5 &6Ore Crystals&r.
quest.22878CFA5B7B90AD.quest_desc5: These can then be sent into your Chemical Injection Chamber to follow the rest of the processing chain.
quest.22878CFA5B7B90AD.title: &6Crystallizing Chemicals
quest.228C9567BB43034A.quest_desc1: The &aPneumatic Dynamo&r converts excess pressure into Forge Energy (FE).
quest.228C9567BB43034A.title: &fTurning Pressure Into FE
quest.22B83D03C6C3E61E.quest_desc1: Improves operation speed, but reduces energy efficiency.
quest.234945ED1315945B.quest_desc1: &aProjectile &bBlueprints&r can be used to create a wide assortment of bullets to use in the &aRevolver&r or &dRailgun&r.
quest.234945ED1315945B.title: &fProjectiles &bBlueprints
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.quest_desc1: ["Upgrading ", {"text": "Strigeor's Higher Binding", "color": "#FF5555"}, " with ", {"text": "Orange", "color": "#FCA645"}, " and ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, " chalks, and ", {"text": "Spirit Attuned Crystals", "color": "#FF55FF"}, " allows you to permanently bind the powerful ", {"text": "Afrit", "color": "#FF55FF"}, " to an item."]
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.quest_desc3: Some &eBinding Rituals&r are optional, but you will need most of them if you want to reach &6Occultism&r end-game.
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.quest_desc5: Click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.title: &dSevira's Permanent Confinement
quest.23C901E3B4AC916D.quest_desc1: There are many ancient structures in these waters...
quest.23C901E3B4AC916D.quest_desc3: Normally, infusing &dEnder Pearls&r with &cBlaze Powder&r gives them the property of locating the home of the Enderman.
quest.23C901E3B4AC916D.quest_desc5: On this planet, the Eyes hunger for something more... nautical.
quest.23C901E3B4AC916D.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Craft the &dNautical Eye&r. This can be used to find the Nautic Crystal structure.
quest.23C901E3B4AC916D.title: Getting Nauti-cal
quest.2435B9F22A09A945.quest_desc1: One of the best items to make at the start of your Ars journey is the &aRing of Lesser Discount&r. This ring reduces the &cmana cost&r of your spells by 10 while equipped in the ring slot, as well as giving a small amount of max mana and mana regen.
quest.2435B9F22A09A945.quest_desc3: You can also upgrade the ring to a &aRing of Greater Discount&r, decreasing your spell costs by 20!
quest.2435B9F22A09A945.quest_desc5: Check the &bCurios&r tab out in your inventory to see how many fingers you can put rings on!
quest.2435B9F22A09A945.title: &fCheaper &dSpells&f!
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc1: The &aSuperior Gemset Ring&r has a two gem slots.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc3: The first has a base multiplier of x0.875, while the second has a x1.75 base multiplier.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc5: These base multipliers stack with &aBanding Material&r quality multipliers.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc7: The same gem can be slotted into both slots, providing an effective x2.625 base multiplier.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.title: &fSuperior Gemset Ring
quest.2464B384CC26F2EC.quest_desc1: &aMatter Tanks&r are used to store matter disintegrated from blocks.
quest.2464B384CC26F2EC.quest_desc3: They will automatically fill up with any available &bMatter&r in the same network.
quest.2464B384CC26F2EC.quest_desc5: You can also lock a &aMatter Tank's&r wihthin its interface to only accept the matter type inside it.
quest.24CE908ED60FD514.quest_desc1: The &aPulverizer&r is a simple machine that can be used to make Dusts and Biomass.
quest.24CE908ED60FD514.quest_desc3: In the early game, this is also the best way to get &6Enderic Compounds&r.
quest.24CE908ED60FD514.title: It's Crushing Time
quest.24E7FEB8D24FAB4A.quest_desc1: The &aChemical Injection Chamber&r is used to combine a gas with a block to create a new item. While this machine can be used to oxidize copper or bring dead coral back to life, it's mostly used as the starting chain for the &aTier 3 Ore Processing Chain&r.
quest.24E7FEB8D24FAB4A.quest_desc3: If you want to upgrade your ore processing chain, just slap this machine down at the front of your current Tier 2 chain, and send then raw ores you have into it!
quest.24E7FEB8D24FAB4A.quest_desc5: To break down ores, it will need the &aHydrogen Chloride&r from the previous quest to operate. You can also use Salt, but you'll burn through it all pretty fast.
quest.24E7FEB8D24FAB4A.quest_desc7: Once you've got it up and running, this machine breaks down 1 raw ore into 4 &aOre Shards&r, which can then be sent into the Purification Chamber to be further processed.
quest.24E7FEB8D24FAB4A.title: &aChemical Injection Chamber
quest.24F17FA24ED466FA.quest_desc1: &a基础流体储罐&r的功能可不仅仅是储存流体，它还能当桶使！
quest.24F17FA24ED466FA.quest_desc3: 潜行的时候拿着储罐，相当于把模式调整为&a桶&r，这样就可以装起多桶流体（比如水或熔岩）。
quest.24F17FA24ED466FA.title: {"text": "基础液体储罐", "color": "#5EFCB6"}
quest.251519A706E46BD7.quest_desc1: I've spent what has felt like &odays&r running back and forth to my &awater strainer&r to collect all of the pebbles it's gathered.
quest.251519A706E46BD7.quest_desc3: There has to be an easier way to get cobblestone.
quest.251519A706E46BD7.quest_desc5: The &aTempered Glass Jar&r seems like it can get hot enough over time. I just need just a little bit of &clava&r...
quest.251519A706E46BD7.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Gather enough &3Cobblestone&r and create &cLava&r using the &aTempered Glass Jar&r.
quest.251519A706E46BD7.title: Heating Things Up A Little
quest.2556FBE2470B6DC8.quest_desc1: "Traveller, your journey through the Rift has come to an end. But every ending is just the beginning of another story.
quest.2556FBE2470B6DC8.quest_desc11: But the adventure doesn’t end here. New worlds await, new challenges rise, and we look forward to seeing you again in the next great expedition. Until then, keep exploring, keep creating… and remember: the Rift is never truly closed.
quest.2556FBE2470B6DC8.quest_desc3: On behalf of the entire Feed the Beast team, thank you. Thank you for playing, for exploring, for braving the unknown. It’s your passion, your curiosity, and your support that allow us to keep crafting worlds, building adventures, and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in modded Minecraft.
quest.2556FBE2470B6DC8.quest_desc7: We hope this journey has been one to remember—full of discovery, challenge, and moments that made you stop and wonder. Every block placed, every puzzle solved, and every challenge overcome is a part of the story, and we’re honoured to have shared it with you.
quest.2568C81FA7914FE2.quest_desc1: &6量子纠缠器&r可以将所有量子合成存储方块的内存翻四倍。
quest.2568C81FA7914FE2.quest_desc3: 每个多方块合成器只允许放一个量子计算机。
quest.2568C81FA7914FE2.title: &f量子纠缠器
quest.257B0B828021A1E3.quest_desc1: The &bCelestigem Bow&r is a big upgrade as a ranged weapon.
quest.257B0B828021A1E3.quest_desc3: This bow allows you to install several new upgrades, including the &dHoming Arrow&r upgrade!
quest.257B0B828021A1E3.title: &dCelestigem Bow
quest.2588279A071E5A6B.quest_desc1: When a mob or living entity dies, it releases a &9Soul&r. If a block capable of collecting it is within range (16 blocks), the &9Soul&r will be collected by that block. This is visually represented by a small particle flying towards the collecting block.
quest.2588279A071E5A6B.quest_desc3: &9Souls&r can be collected by &dArcane Catalysts&r and &dSpawner Controllers&r, and will always move towards the closest collecting block.
quest.2588279A071E5A6B.title: &9Collecting Souls
quest.259818648228F2E9.quest_desc1: In order to craft &2Tier 2&r seeds, you will need to have made an &aAtomic Reconstructor&r from &6Actually Additions&r.
quest.259818648228F2E9.quest_desc3: To charge your &aProsperity Seed&r, simply throw it in the laser coming out of a powered &aAtomic Reconstructor&r.
quest.259818648228F2E9.title: &2Charged Prosperity Seeds
quest.25EB6E3274347822.quest_desc1: The &dEnergized Induction Matrix&r is the ultimate way to store tons of power!
quest.25EB6E3274347822.quest_desc3: This is a custom multiblock structure that can be built up to 18x18x18 for all of your power storage needs. It only requires 1 &aInduction Cell&r, 1 &aInduction Provider&r, and &aInduction Ports&r to pull and push power out.
quest.25EB6E3274347822.quest_desc5: To build this, the smallest structure that can be made is a 3x4x3 multiblock. The frame must be made up of &aInduction Casings&r, and the faces can be &aStructural Glass&r or &aInduction Ports&r.
quest.25EB6E3274347822.quest_desc7: Inside of the structure, you'll place down your &aInduction Cells&r and &aProviders&r. Providers determine how fast the Matrix can push or pull power, whereas the Cells determine the maximum amount of power that can be stored. You can mix and match however many you want of each, as long as it is placed inside of the structure.
quest.25EB6E3274347822.quest_desc9: &aInduction Ports&r can be configured to input or output power by sneak-using a &aConfigurator&r on them. I suggest on using at least 2 for your first Matrix!
quest.25EB6E3274347822.title: &fThe &dEnergized Induction Matrix
quest.262464EE203C7A1B.quest_desc1: &6Oritech&r offers different &aJetpack&r variants. All of them can fly using either energy or &cTurbofuel&r. To fill them with energy, any energy storage or a charger can be used. To fill the internal tank, a &aCharger Block&r is required.
quest.262464EE203C7A1B.quest_desc3: When supplied with &cTurbofuel&r the flight of the jetpack will be much faster. &aExo Jetpack&r variants are faster than their basic counterparts. They will move faster upwards, and also increase the forward speed without having to go up aswell.
quest.262464EE203C7A1B.quest_desc5: &aJetpacks&r can't be turned on or off. They'll be active when the jump key is held.
quest.262464EE203C7A1B.quest_desc7: Both &aJetpack&r variants have an elytra counterpart. In this case, the &aJetpack&r will only be active when the user is flying with the elytra, and will provide an upward boost, like using fireworks.
quest.262464EE203C7A1B.title: Jetpacks
quest.262F5FE957F52F5D.quest_desc1: &dMob Souls&r have special properties, and can be captured by using &aEmpty Soul Vials&r on a mob. These souls can be extracted to make end-game items in a &dSoul Binder&r.
quest.262F5FE957F52F5D.quest_desc3: The &dSoul Binder&r consumes liquid experience and a filled &aSoul Vial&r to convert &7Broken Spawners&r or create new empowered items.
quest.262F5FE957F52F5D.quest_desc5: Note: &aFused Quartz&r is made by smelting 4 Nether Quarts in an Alloy Smelter.
quest.262F5FE957F52F5D.title: &fBinding Souls
quest.2630B3D5D3B8A67C.quest_desc1: Inside of the structure, there should be a different type of water to find.
quest.2630B3D5D3B8A67C.quest_desc3: This &bSalt Water&r is an important fluid that you'll need for progression in the mod!
quest.2642E8FE5AD1E8C3.quest_desc1: Finding &bQuartz&r means I'm close to making basic tech!!!
quest.2642E8FE5AD1E8C3.quest_desc3: I would not be surprised if I could use this to make new alloys in my Foundry.
quest.2642E8FE5AD1E8C3.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Explore the different crafting uses of &bNether Quartz&r.
quest.2642E8FE5AD1E8C3.title: Conductive Resources&r
quest.264C4CE122513D7B.quest_desc1: The &6Master Marid Miner&r is the most powerful miner &bSpirit&r.
quest.264C4CE122513D7B.quest_desc3: It has the fastest mining speed and best lamp preservation. Unlike other miners, they can also mine rare ores like &dAncient Debris&r and &dIesnium Ore&r.
quest.264C4CE122513D7B.title: &6Master Marid Miner
quest.2682A911828C2D88.quest_desc1: Have you ever wished you had stairs of a certain block type? Maybe a slab of a block that you don't normally have?
quest.2682A911828C2D88.quest_desc3: &aFramed Blocks&r allow you to create custom blocks and shapes that uses the texture of almost any other block in the pack! To do this, place down a framed block, and then use the block with the desired texture on the framed block to copy the texture over.
quest.2682A911828C2D88.quest_desc5: There are also some cool features for these blocks, like using &6Glowstone Dust&r on a framed block to make it glow!
quest.2682A911828C2D88.title: &2Framed Blocks&r
quest.26B6680DCE14A228.quest_desc1: The &aCharging Station&r allows you to fill items up with &bCompressed Air&r.
quest.26B6680DCE14A228.quest_desc3: It will only fill items to have equal &bPressure&r that the &aCharging Station&r itself has.
quest.26B6680DCE14A228.quest_desc5: If the item has higher pressure than the &aCharging Station&r, it will empty itself back into the network.
quest.26B6680DCE14A228.title: &fCharging Station
quest.26D59E04760C5747.quest_desc1: The &aDestroyer Block&r is a multiblock that operates on a &aMachine Frame&r gantry and destroys the block layer directly below the frame.
quest.26D59E04760C5747.quest_desc3: The time and energy required to break a block depend on the block's hardness. The &aBlock Destroyer&r attempts to destroy all blocks below. To enable farming use, the &bCrop Filter Addon&r can be installed, which causes the &aBlock Destroyer&r to skip all non-finished crops.
quest.26D59E04760C5747.quest_desc5: By adding &bQuarry Addons&r, the &aBlock Destroyer&r can also function as a quarry. Each &bQuarry Addon&r multiplies the range by 8 blocks.
quest.26D59E04760C5747.quest_desc7: This means one &bQuarry Addon&r provides an 8-block range, two &bQuarry Addons&r give a 64-block range, and three &bQuarry Addons&r extend it to a 512-block range!
quest.26D7C5298D95C69A.quest_desc1: When crafting &bJewelry&r, &aBanding Materials&r can be used by themselves to grant effects and/or stat increases.
quest.26D7C5298D95C69A.quest_desc3: Their main use, however, is to multiply &aGems&r effects with their quality multiplier.
quest.26D7C5298D95C69A.title: &fBanding Materials
quest.26D8F6345B6AB232.quest_desc1: The &bSorceror's Set&r is for those who don't need the defense, because they aren't going to get hit in the first place. Or at least they think they won't.
quest.26D8F6345B6AB232.quest_desc3: When upgraded, this set has many more high-tier thread slots.
quest.26D8F6345B6AB232.title: &bSorceror Set
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.quest_desc1: You want a faster furnace? Mystical Ag. has you covered.
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.quest_desc3: The &bFurnace&r uses power to smelt items, and comes with a built in &agenerator&r using burnable items like coal or wood.
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.quest_desc5: Just like other machines from the mod, the &bFurnace&r can also be upgraded using &aMachine Upgrades&r to increase the overall speed of the machine, fuel storage, and more.
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.title: &fThe &aFurnace
quest.26F18323EB6EFCA0.quest_desc1: &bSnad&r blocks allow you to create farms of Cactus or Sugarcane easily. These can also be given a redstone signal to increase the growth rate of the crop.
quest.2765AC7C3E0350FE.quest_desc1: Mobs can be spawned by combining a &dSpawner Controller&r with a &aSpawner Cage&r below. The size of the spawned entity determines the required cage size. The type of mob spawned is determined by the first mob to walk over the &dSpawner Controller&r and can only be changed by replacing it.
quest.2765AC7C3E0350FE.quest_desc3: The &dSpawner Controller&r collects &9Souls&r and uses them to spawn the set mob, with the &9Soul&r cost depending on the mob's HP. Mobs will only spawn if an empty surface is available nearby.
quest.2765AC7C3E0350FE.quest_desc5: When a mob type is set (or when right-clicked if invalid), the &dSpawner Controller&r highlights the required size of the &aSpawner Cage&r below. You can also right-click the &dSpawner Controller&r to get information on the current operational state.
quest.2765AC7C3E0350FE.title: &9Spawning Mobs
quest.276D2B384F21AC10.quest_desc1: The &aFerricore Sword&r is a little better than Iron, can equipped with the &aMob Scanner&r upgrade.
quest.276D2B384F21AC10.title: &fFerricore Sword
quest.27C5F8272212B35A.quest_desc1: 通用机械的最终目的是建起一座巨型高科技工厂，现在是时候升级你的机器了！
quest.27C5F8272212B35A.quest_desc3: 你可以选择把机器直接合成为&a基础工厂&r，或者拿着&a基础升级&r对着机器使用也行。
quest.27C5F8272212B35A.quest_desc5: 加装后机器就会升级为&a工厂&r，工厂一次可输入输出的物品会提升。工厂等级越高，并行处理的效率就越高！
quest.27C5F8272212B35A.quest_desc7: 注意：你不能把终极工厂安装器直接糊在基础工厂上，必须按照基础—>高级—>精英—>终极顺序升级。
quest.27C5F8272212B35A.title: &a建造&d工厂
quest.27E0738B56C6ED8C.quest_desc1: Binding a &7Foliot&r to the satchel significantly increases its storage capacity, making it a great travel companion.
quest.27E0738B56C6ED8C.title: &aSurprisingly Substantial Satchel
quest.283EA4E7BA93DA11.quest_desc1: The &aEmpowerer&r will consume four surrounding items to empower your crystals.
quest.283EA4E7BA93DA11.quest_desc3: You'll need to set up your &aDisplay Stands&r two blocks away on each side of the &aEmpowerer&r.
quest.283EA4E7BA93DA11.quest_desc5: The position of items on the &aDisplay Stands&r do not matter, but you will need to power them.
quest.283EA4E7BA93DA11.title: &fEmpowering Crystals
quest.28493A960B770451.quest_desc1: Each &dTier 3 Dimensional Storage Stablizer&r adds 2048000 items, and 256 item types, up to four &aStablizers&r.
quest.28493A960B770451.title: &dTier 3 Dimensional Storage Stabilizer
quest.287D00E1CE70F334.quest_desc1: The &2Improved Blast Furnace&r is a large multiblock machine that functions the same as the &aCrude Blast Furnace&r, but has some extra features:
quest.287D00E1CE70F334.quest_desc3: - It can have up to two Preheaters, which can be powered with RF to improve processing speed.
quest.287D00E1CE70F334.quest_desc5: - It can be automated to retrieve items from the top, export steel from the front, and export slag from the back.
quest.287D00E1CE70F334.quest_desc7: To help build this multiblock, make sure to check out the &bEngineer's Manual&r!
quest.287D00E1CE70F334.title: &fImproved Blast Furnace
quest.28F0BF534E097FE8.quest_desc1: &2Industrial Hemp&r is proving to be incredibly durable.
quest.28F0BF534E097FE8.quest_desc3: The strands themselves are great sources of &bString&r, but I believe I can bind these together to make a replacement for &aLeather&r.
quest.28F0BF534E097FE8.quest_desc5: For that to happen, I'll need some sort of binding agent.
quest.28F0BF534E097FE8.quest_desc7: I believe I can fashion a pot to cook up something just for that!
quest.28F0BF534E097FE8.title: Leather Alternative
quest.28F2D895C980C8CF.quest_desc1: This &aCooking Pot&r is going to be incredibly useful for making a good home cooked meal later on, but for now, I just need something sticky to hold together some fabric.
quest.28F2D895C980C8CF.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Use the &aCooking Pot&r to melt down sugar into &eHoney Bottles&r, then use it to create &2Ersatz Leather&r.
quest.290E1C79E7CD3C2A.title: &fPlatinum Banding
quest.29323A6F09BAA5BD.quest_desc1: The &aPlacer Block&r places blocks from its inventory onto the layer below the &aMachine Frame&r. It can also be used to plant seeds in farmland or saplings.
quest.2953423FCB0A3146.quest_desc1: One of the most important machines you can make in NauTec is the &aMixer&r. This machine requires &bLaser Power&r from the &bCrystal&r.
quest.2953423FCB0A3146.quest_desc3: This allows you to create new types of liquids and items, most importantly, &aElectrolyte Algae Serum&r.
quest.2953423FCB0A3146.quest_desc5: Note:  Each item in a recipe needs to be placed into the machine from each cardinal direction.
quest.2953423FCB0A3146.quest_desc7: You can output items from the bottom.
quest.2953423FCB0A3146.title: &fUnderwater Brewing
quest.296C424C7D2C7589.title: {"text": "基础加压管道", "color": "#5EFCB6"}
quest.298BFB73F3B2E3D5.quest_desc1: &aBatteries&r are a good way to store energy to move around. They can be charged with any wired or wireless charging method.
quest.298BFB73F3B2E3D5.quest_desc3: 电池拿在手里的时候潜行+右键就可以转化为释放模式，在这个模式下会为物品栏别的东西充能。
quest.298BFB73F3B2E3D5.title: &f电池
quest.2992268BD1E5C553.quest_desc1: &aEmpowering&r blocks costs the same as a single crystal, giving you more value per operation.
quest.2992268BD1E5C553.title: Empowered Crystal Blocks
quest.299CD86325D3D74B.quest_desc1: &aHeat Sinks&r can be placed on a block or machine to help dissipate &cHeat&r faster!
quest.299CD86325D3D74B.quest_desc3: Their effectiveness can be greatly increased by using an &aAir Grate&r to vent air over the fins. Combining that with the use of &aVortex Tubes&r can effectively handle all of your temperature problems!
quest.299CD86325D3D74B.quest_desc5: &eNote&r: Once a &aHeat Sink&r reaches over 60C or under -60C, it will &cdeal damage when touched&r.
quest.299CD86325D3D74B.title: &fHeat Sink
quest.29A0F6B08A706371.title: &f有用的&a二阶&r魔符
quest.29C1C4491D8B344E.quest_desc1: The &aLightning Rod&r is a power generator that generates an enormous amount of HV power when struck by lightning.
quest.29C1C4491D8B344E.quest_desc3: Stacking &aSteel Fences&r on the port on top of the &aLightning Rod&r increases the chances that it is hit during a thunderstorm.
quest.29C1C4491D8B344E.quest_desc5: To learn more about them, check out the &aElectrical Grids&r section of the &bEngineer's Manual&r.
quest.29C1C4491D8B344E.title: &fLightning Rod
quest.29CEF5D43415B227.quest_desc1: The &dWarper Relay&r is used to teleport Source to other &dWarper Relays&r, no matter how far away.
quest.29CEF5D43415B227.quest_desc3: &eNote&r: Distances beyond 30 blocks will have a chance to lose some Source when warping.
quest.29CEF5D43415B227.title: &dWarping Source
quest.2A1AE478A678C1A9.title: &f能量接口
quest.2A5C2E704DE70301.title: &cBlazegold Sword
quest.2A8CE31467C66033.quest_desc1: It's like a &aCoal Generator&r that fits into your pocket!
quest.2A8CE31467C66033.quest_desc3: It burns fuel sources to generate energy to power the items in your inventory!
quest.2A8CE31467C66033.title: &fPocket Generator
quest.2A9FBA823B2C99E9.quest_desc1: When flowing &cLava&r touches both Soul Soil and Blue Ice, it creates &6Basalt&r.
quest.2A9FBA823B2C99E9.quest_desc3: Crushing Basalt and running it through a sluice is a great way to create more Netherrack.
quest.2A9FBA823B2C99E9.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Automate creating Basalt by creating a vanilla Basalt generator using Lava, Soul Soil, and Blue Ice.
quest.2A9FBA823B2C99E9.quest_desc7: Ice can be made using Primogel Goo. While optional, the &aBlock Breaker&r can be used to automate the hammering process without the need of power.
quest.2A9FBA823B2C99E9.quest_desc9: The &aCollector Upgrade&r works like a magnet and can be installed in a Drawer. It can be configured by right clicking the upgrade inside of the Drawer interface. This will let you set the direction it trys to pull from.
quest.2A9FBA823B2C99E9.title: Netherrack Farming With Basalt
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc1: The &aDimensional Mineshaft&r is used to harverst resources from an uninhabited mining dimension.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc11: 2) A comparator can be used to get a redstone signal based on occupied slots and lamp durability.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc3: The &aDimensional Mineshaft&r will discard any items it cannot store, so it is important to regularly empty the mineshaft.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc5: &bSpirits&r in lamps can be inserted from the top, and items can be extracted from all other sides.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc7: The &aDimensional Mineshaft&r has two interactions with redstone:
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc9: 1) The &bSpirit&r will stop working when receiving a redstone signal.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.title: &cDimensional Mineshaft
quest.2AE9ADF578ABEA11.title: &dSupremium Essence&r
quest.2AF06433C6EDDB62.title: &cTertium &fMachine Upgrade
quest.2AF7DF42143C5443.quest_desc1: 有的玩家讨厌那些婴儿式UI，想直接触摸机器运作的根本原理，&a集成动力&r正是为此而生。
quest.2AF7DF42143C5443.quest_desc3: 这个模组比较有难度，但是那些能熟练使用该模组的玩家可以轻松拿捏物流系统。你可以用它搭建一个瞬间传输物流系统，或者一个全自定义的物流过滤……全靠你的想象！
quest.2AF7DF42143C5443.quest_desc5: 只要有正确的&a接口&r，&a逻辑线缆&r以及&a变量卡&r，这个物流网络就可以传输一切。
quest.2AF7DF42143C5443.title: &b动态联合
quest.2AF9753B396F7625.quest_desc1: Once you've collected at least 4 &dSupremium Essence&r, you can now craft the &6Master Infusion Crystal&r.
quest.2AF9753B396F7625.quest_desc3: It's an Infusion Crystal that never breaks!
quest.2AF9753B396F7625.title: &dMaster Infusion Crystal
quest.2B0CFC423CE66AAE.quest_desc1: If you hold a &aHoe&r in either hand and spam crouch, you can speed up the growth of nearby crops!
quest.2B0CFC423CE66AAE.quest_desc3: While this doesn't work on crops from Mystical Agriculture, it does work on &bBudding Certus Quartz&r!
quest.2B0CFC423CE66AAE.title: Twerk To Work
quest.2B6A88AA896C54A6.quest_desc1: When used, this upgrade will allow x-ray vision of all ores through the walls around you.
quest.2B6A88AA896C54A6.title: &fUpgrade: Ore X-Ray
quest.2B6EC298B50C0D03.quest_desc1: When powered, the &aTree Cutter&r is a basic machine that will cut down an entire tree in one go, including the leaves!
quest.2B6EC298B50C0D03.quest_desc3: The &aTree Cutter&r will only cut logs up to 7 blocks away, so it may not reach the top of larger trees.
quest.2B6EC298B50C0D03.quest_desc5: The logs, leaves, and drops from the leaves are stored in the &aTree Cutter's&r internal inventory.
quest.2B6EC298B50C0D03.title: Tree Automation
quest.2B8B225CF404A351.quest_desc1: The &aEnchanter&r is an &dEnchantment Table&r that allows you to pick which enchantment you want to make.
quest.2B8B225CF404A351.quest_desc3: When provided with specific items and &6experience&r, you can enchant &aBook \&\ Quills&r with an enchantment of your choice.
quest.2B8B225CF404A351.quest_desc5: To see which enchantments you can make, make sure to check out the uses in JEI!
quest.2B8B225CF404A351.title: &fEnchanter
quest.2BBC0C4236AB7C3E.quest_desc1: With a &6Time Crystal Block&r, I'm able to make an even better &dAttenuation Crystal&r.
quest.2BBC0C4236AB7C3E.quest_desc3: This is buying me more and more time to be able to find the source that is tying me to this world.
quest.2BBC0C4236AB7C3E.quest_desc7: Note: Using these Crystals in the final tier &aEmpowering Craft&r will add 15 more minutes of Rift Charge per craft, but destroys the crystals in the process.
quest.2BEABBCA1FB4A824.quest_desc1: To no surprise at all, I haven't seen a single land animal since I crashed onto this planet, and let me tell you something...
quest.2BEABBCA1FB4A824.quest_desc11: Using this should open a portal with a challenge!
quest.2BEABBCA1FB4A824.quest_desc13: Note: Mobs spawn within an &a8 block radius&r around the portal, and can spawn underwater. Build accordingly!
quest.2BEABBCA1FB4A824.quest_desc5: The &2Infusion&r setup should allow me to create a magical item that opens a one-way portal to ship in some livestock.
quest.2BEABBCA1FB4A824.quest_desc7: It's kind of like ordering pizza, except from another dimension.
quest.2BEABBCA1FB4A824.quest_desc9: &6&o&nTASK&r: Using the &2Infusion Altar&r, create a &2Gate Pearl: Gateway of the Emerald Grove&r.
quest.2BEABBCA1FB4A824.title: Passive Mobs
quest.2C0B3B4BFDD9C502.quest_desc1: If we infuse our &bReinforced Alloys&r with &dEnriched Obsidian&r, we can make an &dAtomic Alloys&r.
quest.2C0B3B4BFDD9C502.title: &dAtomic Alloys
quest.2C0C63951FDED180.quest_desc1: &dParticle Accelators&r are quite complex! Because of this, each part is split into different quests to break down how they all work.
quest.2C0C63951FDED180.quest_desc3: To create new items with this machine, you will need to collide items from two separate controllers.
quest.2C0C63951FDED180.title: &d Particle Accelerator
quest.2C1649AE3DADD71D.quest_desc1: &bConstruction Sticks&r is a mod all about making the building process much faster.
quest.2C1649AE3DADD71D.quest_desc3: While holding a &bConstruction Stick&r in your hand, you can extend blocks in any direction with just one click!
quest.2C1649AE3DADD71D.quest_desc5: There are also some cool upgrades that you can add to the Sticks, like making it use power instead of durability.
quest.2C1649AE3DADD71D.title: Faster Building
quest.2C33DB689BC13D4E.quest_desc1: To craft &5Ludicrite&r, insert two &9Blutonium&r ingots and one ingot's worth of &bLiquid Cyanite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.2C33DB689BC13D4E.quest_desc3: You'll need a &6Fluidizer&r built to &eSolid Mode&r to get &bLiquid Cyanite&r.
quest.2C33DB689BC13D4E.title: &5Ludicrite
quest.2C55C6EBABA86BA8.title: &fSimple Block Breaker
quest.2CBB753B405D3888.quest_desc1: With the &bCelestigem Hoe&r, you can use it to create &dVoidshimmer Soil&r.
quest.2CBB753B405D3888.quest_desc3: This soil is faster than the previous tier, and will also autoharvest fully grown crops.
quest.2CBB753B405D3888.quest_desc5: Since the Celestigem Hoe can be upgraded with the &dDrops Teleport Upgrade&r, you can bind it to an inventory and then till out the soil.
quest.2CBB753B405D3888.quest_desc7: This will cause the crops to autoharvest and collect into the bound inventory instead!
quest.2CBB753B405D3888.title: &dCelestigem Hoe
quest.2CC60A9AD991255F.quest_desc1: The deeper I go, the less this world wants me here.
quest.2CC60A9AD991255F.quest_desc11: Because down there, in the black… &5something is waiting&r.
quest.2CC60A9AD991255F.quest_desc3: Light fades faster than it should. The water feels thicker, like it’s resisting me. My suit groans under the pressure, and the cold is finding ways in.
quest.2CC60A9AD991255F.quest_desc5: If I push any further with my current gear, I won’t be coming back.
quest.2CC60A9AD991255F.quest_desc9: I need something stronger- something that goes beyond science. Magic. Alchemy. Whatever-the-hell force is woven into these ruins. It lingers in the carvings, in the whispers that drift through the deep. If I can harness it, fuse it with my tech, I might just stand a chance.
quest.2CC60A9AD991255F.title: Log Entry 008
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc1: There are two methods of cooling your &dReactors&r:
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc10: In this case, the coolant will be vaporized and the vapor can be extracted from the &dReactor&r to drive the rotors of one or more &3Turbines&r
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc3: &aPassive Cooling&r: Generates energy directly without any external medium.
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc5: This is your standard standalone &dReactor&r setup.
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc8: &aActive Cooling&r: Uses an external coolant to dissipate &cHeat&r.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc1: Underneath that small structure was a &omassive&r Crystal.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc13: To activate the crystal, place the &bAquatic Catalyst&r a few blocks away from one of the crystal's sides.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc15: On the side facing away from the Crystal, use the &dHeart of the Sea&r on the &bAquatic Catalyst&r.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc17: You'll then need to pump in &2Kelp&r into the Catalyst with something like a Hopper.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc19: The energy beams can kill you.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc3: There are tons of crates and blocks that were left behind from previous explorers...
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc5: These &bCatalysts&r have channels on each side, which means something should be able to flow through them.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc7: That's got to have something to do with this Crystal...
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.quest_desc9: &6&o&nTASK&r: Using the &bAquatic Catalyst&r and &dHeart of the Sea&r, active the Crystal and use it to create &6Aquarine Steel Ingots&r.
quest.2CFD9B1806BB52F0.title: Aquatic Crystal Power
quest.2D4CECA1F01E2E3B.title: &bImperium &fMachine Upgrade
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc1: &a咖啡制造机&r可以制作像药水一样的饮料，喝了可以获得很多buff。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc10: 你可以用它酿造出以下的buff：
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc12: 河豚：提供&9水下呼吸&r，最大可达2级。（译者注：什么神人能在咖啡机放河豚我请问了）
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc14: 岩浆膏：提供&6防火&r，最大可达2级。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc16: 金胡萝卜：提供&e夜视&r，最大可达2级。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc18: 发酵蛛眼：提供&7隐身&r，最大可达2级。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc20: 恶魂之泪：提供&c再生&r，最大可达三级。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc22: 烈焰粉：提供&d力量&r，最大可达四级。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc24: 糖：提供&b速度&r，最大可达四级。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc26: 牛奶瓶/桶：buff时间延长一分钟，但是药水等级下降一级。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc3: 这台机器需要能源才能正常工作，它将会把&a咖啡豆&r和水混合，然后倒在&a空杯子&r里头产出一份&a咖啡&r。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc5: 最多可以在GUI中放入八格物品，以此获得不同buff。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.quest_desc7: 注意：GUI中的小数字展示了制造咖啡中物品的消耗顺序，所以仔细规划buff的获得顺序。
quest.2D7445BDE865635C.title: &f咖啡制造机
quest.2D7C1AA1C36101EA.quest_desc1: On my quest to find a more efficient way to process &aore clusters&r, I've managed to create a stronger glass in my furnace.
quest.2D7C1AA1C36101EA.quest_desc11: Jars will automatically push crafting products into adjacent storage. If it doesn't have something to push to, it will just &aspit it out&r onto the floor.
quest.2D7C1AA1C36101EA.quest_desc13: They also must be manually activated by pressing the &aMix&r button. This can be automated by making a &6Jar Automater&r.
quest.2D7C1AA1C36101EA.quest_desc3: This &bTempered Glass&r seems to be able to withstand high temperatures. This has to be the breakthrough I am looking for!
quest.2D7C1AA1C36101EA.quest_desc5: It needs a strong cap on it to store heat. The &3Cast Iron Ingot&r I've made seems strong enough to do the trick.
quest.2D7C1AA1C36101EA.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Craft a &aTempered Glass Jar&r from &bTempered Glass&r and the &3Cast Iron Ingot&r.
quest.2D7C1AA1C36101EA.title: Tempered Glass
quest.2D913EC86DC39C3C.quest_desc1: The &cDjinni Sunshine Spirit&r can be used to clear the weather.
quest.2D913EC86DC39C3C.quest_desc3: &eWeather Spirits&r will modify the weather once before vanishing.
quest.2D913EC86DC39C3C.title: &cDjinni Weather Mage
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc1: Using &aHedyrin's Lure&r you can summon &eFamiliars&r that can perform tasks or provide buffs to the player.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc10: - Upgraded: Looks for items for its master.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc12: &aParrot&r: Provides company to its caring owner.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc13: - Has no upgradeable Effect, as such, it cannot be upgraded.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc3: &aBeaver&r: Chops down nearby small trees, and increases wood break speed
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc4: - Upgraded: Gives free snacks when right-clicked with an empty hand
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc6: &aDeer&r: Step Assist, Increased Speed, and Jump Boost
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc7: - Upgraded: Extra Step Assist and attacks nearby enemies with a hammer.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc9: &aGreedy&r: Picks up neargy items and increases pickup range
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.title: &aHedyrin's Familiars
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc1: &a/sethome&r - Sets a &eHome&r for you to teleport back to. This cannot be set below crushing depths.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc11: Note: Using &a/back&r to get to another dimension will still have the item requirements that are needed to enter the dimension.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc15: &a/tpa (玩家名)&r - 将你传送到你的朋友所在的位置。
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc17: &a/ftbteambases visit (玩家名)&r - 探访朋友的基地。
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc19: This pack comes with several new types of &aResource Packs&r!
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc21: These can easily be enabled or disabled in your &bOptions&r.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc5: &a/ftbteambases home&r - Teleports you back to your &ePod Spawn Location&r.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc7: &a/back&r - 传送回你上次死亡的位置。
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.title: 实用指令
quest.2E01CCF4FC7D949F.quest_desc1: &aThe Ender&r is a basic sword made of &aDark Steel&r.
quest.2E01CCF4FC7D949F.quest_desc3: While it doesn't pack much of a punch, this sword is great to use for gathering &aMob Heads&r.
quest.2E01CCF4FC7D949F.title: &fThe Ender
quest.2E1393EB3FAF322C.quest_desc1: Specific mobs can drop rare items that you can use to augment your body!
quest.2E1393EB3FAF322C.quest_desc3: The &aGuardian Eye&r gives you the ability to shoot a Laser at an entity you are looking at within a 15 block radius. Dropped from Guardians.
quest.2E1393EB3FAF322C.quest_desc5: The &aDolphin Fin&r gives you the Dolphin's Grace effect while swimming. Dropped from Dolphins.
quest.2E1393EB3FAF322C.quest_desc7: The &aDrowned Lungs&r allow you to breathe underwater. Dropped from Drowned.
quest.2E1393EB3FAF322C.quest_desc9: The &aEldritch Heart&r increases your regeneration while under water. It is also required to craft the &dAugmentation Station&r. Dropped from Elder Guardians.
quest.2E1393EB3FAF322C.title: &aAugments&r
quest.2E1BE6F344F285D2.quest_desc1: The &aEnergy Upgrade&r increases the power capacity of the machine, as well as reducing the power consumption per tick!
quest.2E1BE6F344F285D2.title: &fEnergy Upgrade
quest.2E1CE18A917C637C.quest_desc1: The &cOre Miner Djinni&r only harvests ores.
quest.2E1CE18A917C637C.quest_desc3: It is able to mine faster more efficiently than the &7Foliot&r. Because of it's speed, however, it damages its lamp faster.
quest.2E1CE18A917C637C.title: &cOre Miner Djinni
quest.2E2A3DB1E097BAD3.quest_desc1: I've been experimenting more with the &6Golden Mesh&r, and I've found some &cRedstone&r!
quest.2E2A3DB1E097BAD3.quest_desc3: It seems like it holds the key to creating some sort of power source, but that will have to hold off for now. What would I even need to power at this point? My ship is in pieces!
quest.2E2A3DB1E097BAD3.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Gather &aRedstone Chunks&r from sluicing &bDust&r. Craft &eRedstone Clusters&r and smelt these in the &bTempered Glass Jar&r to make &cRedstone&r.
quest.2E2A3DB1E097BAD3.title: The Red Spark
quest.2E3D56F5BC1075DB.quest_desc1: When installed in the &dEclipse Alloy Chestplate&r, this upgrade allows you to have creative flight.
quest.2E3D56F5BC1075DB.title: &fUpgrade: Flight
quest.2E56DB4CBFE2F37C.title: &bImperium Essence&r
quest.2E919C741282C30B.quest_desc1: The water is littered with wreckage, most of it mine. Some of it... isn’t.
quest.2E919C741282C30B.quest_desc10: The thought that gnaws at me is; if I wasn’t the first, and if other ships have been caught in this...
quest.2E919C741282C30B.quest_desc3: I’ve salvaged what I can- some hull plating, circuitry, a few tools that somehow survived.
quest.2E919C741282C30B.quest_desc5: This wasn’t just a freak accident. The way the Continuum was &oripped&r off course, the way every system failed at once... I think this was deliberate.
quest.2E919C741282C30B.quest_desc8: &lI felt it.&r That pull, that raw force, like the universe itself reached out, grabbed hold, and dragged us out of the sky just to watch us fall.
quest.2E9C2F524BE5FC10.quest_desc1: &aEngineering Blocks&r are the core building blocks used to create most of the multiblock machines in the mod.
quest.2E9C2F524BE5FC10.quest_desc3: Note: All machines will require at least one &aRedstone Engineering Block&r!
quest.2E9C2F524BE5FC10.title: &fEngineering Blocks
quest.2EBDE5767588B43C.quest_desc1: To create &6Awakened Supremium&r, we'll need a dust that only drops from the &5Ender Dragon&r or the &5Wither&r.
quest.2EBDE5767588B43C.quest_desc3: This is called &6Cognizant Dust&r, and will only drop when they are slain with a Mystical Agriculture weapon enchanted with &dMystical Enlightenment&r.
quest.2EBDE5767588B43C.title: &6Cognizant Dust&r
quest.2ECAD5F752E445F1.quest_desc1: ["", { "text": "Prometheum", "color":"#FCD205"}, " is an advanced material that can only be produced in an ", { "text": "Atomic Forge", "color":"#FF55FF"}, "." ]
quest.2ECAD5F752E445F1.quest_desc3: ["This powerful resource is essential for crafting ", {"text": "Prometheum Tools", "color":"#FCD205"}, " and the ", {"text": "Ultimate Machine Core", "color":"#FF55FF"}, "."]
quest.2EEE782146096F9C.quest_desc1: Probably one of the best mods out there for builders, the &6Building Gadgets&r mod adds several new gadgets that are a must have to make building better!
quest.2F057F981B68EB95.title: &fSimple Fluid Placer
quest.2F0A0E95F1689256.quest_desc1: I can't keep swimming between these piles of debris. It's taking &ltoo long&r. I'll never survive at this rate.
quest.2F0A0E95F1689256.quest_desc3: Some of these &acrates&r seem to have &2Bamboo&r stuck in them. If I collect enough of them, I can create a makeshift raft to get me by.
quest.2F0A0E95F1689256.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Gather &2Bamboo&r from &acrates&r to create a &eBamboo Raft&r.
quest.2F0C6EA5380AA661.quest_desc1: With &cAfrit Essence&r, you can create the next tier of Chalk: &cRed Chalk&r.
quest.2F0C6EA5380AA661.title: &cRed Chalk
quest.2F2DC018DD6A2A23.quest_desc1: &aGems&r are the part of most &bJewelry&r that grants effects.
quest.2F2DC018DD6A2A23.quest_desc3: Different pieces of &bJewelry&r are affected by &aGems&r in different ways, so be sure to check each piece carefully before crafting.
quest.2F2DC018DD6A2A23.title: &fGems
quest.2F2E3501A70EB920.quest_desc1: The &aRanged Collector&r picks up items within a radius of 6 blocks around it which can be white- or blacklisted.
quest.2F2E3501A70EB920.title: &fRanged Collector
quest.2F6F52B669C50A01.quest_desc1: The &aSharpshooter's Loop&r is a &bRing&r that applies a gem's on-hit effects whenever an arrow hits an enemy.
quest.2F6F52B669C50A01.title: &fSharpshooter's Loop
quest.2F89B4E5640AB5E8.quest_desc1: The &aFermenting Barrel&r is used to make &aRefined Canola&r, which can still be further improved into &cCrystallized Oil&r.
quest.2F89B4E5640AB5E8.title: &fFermenting Barrel
quest.2F8BB4724991B7C4.quest_desc1: The &aIdentification Chamber&r will scan the matter value of items and store them into &aMemory Chips&r.
quest.2F8BB4724991B7C4.quest_desc3: Items will slowly be scanned until 100% of its matter reading is stored onto the &aMemeory Chip&r, at which point, it will consume the scanned item.
quest.2F91C4B265C670BE.quest_desc1: When pressurized, the &bAerial Interface&r exposes your inventory as if were in a chest. Any items inserted into the interface enter your inventory instead.
quest.2F91C4B265C670BE.quest_desc3: Your main inventory is accessed from any horizontal side while your armor is the top face. This can be changed in the UI.
quest.2F91C4B265C670BE.quest_desc5: Having this set up also provides water breathing, at an additional &bAir Pressure&r cost. If you provide it with FE, it will also wirelessly charge all your items! A dispenser upgrade will automatically eat for you, as well as allowing you to pipe experience in and out.
quest.2F91C4B265C670BE.quest_desc7: This can be used to keep your chestplate charged, and your chestplate can be upgraded to charge all other PNC armors and items.
quest.2F91C4B265C670BE.title: &fAerial Interface
quest.2F933169CF164EC7.quest_desc1: By refining &aEthanol&r and a silver plate in the &6Refinery&r, you can get &aAcetaldehyde&r.
quest.2F933169CF164EC7.quest_desc3: This is a key ingredient for making &aPhenolic Resin&r!
quest.2F933169CF164EC7.title: &fAcetaldehyde
quest.2FCED22162B00429.title: &f能量导管
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.quest_desc1: I might not be much of an engineer, but these machines that I'm making are awesome!
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.quest_desc11: The &dEnderic Laser&r is a powered machine that can zap a specific block. Depending on the block that it zaps, it will either break it or convert it into a new item.
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.quest_desc13: To aim the Laser, the &6Target Designator&r can be sneak-used on block to save the location data. Next, sneak-use the Designator on the Laser to transfer the data over.
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.quest_desc15: Note: The Laser might continue blasting, even if there is not a block where it is focusing.
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.quest_desc3: I want to be able to control where the &dEnderic Lens&r zaps, so this machine should be more like an arm that bends.
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.quest_desc5: Of course, I'll need a remote to control it as well.
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Craft the &dEnderic Laser&r and a &6Target Designator&r. Use the Designator to zap an &dAmethyst Crystal&r to get &dFluxite&r.
quest.2FF4717777A2EFEC.title: Laser Beams
quest.2FFA4CF8C062AD5E.quest_desc1: 你可以用&a输入&r和&a输出&r总线，将AE网络内的物品输出至外部，或者将外部存储的物品输入AE网络。
quest.2FFA4CF8C062AD5E.quest_desc3: 把这俩和你的接口与样板供应器组合，可以把整个基地都自动化！
quest.2FFA4CF8C062AD5E.quest_desc5: 上述的设备可以加装各种&a卡&r，比如能让它受红石控制的卡，只允许特定NBT物品输入（或者模糊）的卡，提升速度的&e加速卡&r，以及提升样板存储容量的&e容量卡&r。
quest.2FFA4CF8C062AD5E.title: &fI/O总线
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc1: &aRituals&r will require more than just some symbols drawn on the ground!
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc11: If you want to get special with it, you can also make &aLarge Candles&r using Tallow.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc13: To get &aTallow&r, you will need to kill large animals with a &aButcher's Knife&r. Large animals include:
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc3: Each ritual will need several &aSacrificial Bowls&r, which are used to place items that will be sacrificed to perform the ritual. For the first ritual, you will only need four of these.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc5: The &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r is the centerpiece of the ritual &bPentacle&r. This bowl will hold the key item used in the ritual, which is usually a &dBound Book&r.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc7: For the regular &aSacrificial Bowls&r, the exact placement does not matter as long as they are within 8 blocks of the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc9: What type of ritual is it if it doesn't require some &eCandles&r! Any vanilla candle will do.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.title: &aPreparing For A Ritual
quest.304B25BADD64077D.quest_desc1: You can increase the overall storage size of a backpack by upgrading it to the next tier!
quest.304B25BADD64077D.quest_desc3: From the basic backpack, you can upgrade to either &aCopper&r or &aIron&r. Upgrading to Copper first allows you to save iron, as you only need 4 Iron Ingots to upgrade from Copper.
quest.304B25BADD64077D.quest_desc5: Each tier also allows for more &aUpgrade Slots&r!
quest.304B25BADD64077D.title: &fTier Upgrades
quest.30798DFEB47F36F1.quest_desc1: Using &aHedyrin's Lure&r you can summon &ePossessed Mobs&r that drop loot when killed.
quest.30798DFEB47F36F1.quest_desc9: &aWitch&r: Any of - Water Bottle, Bottle o' Enchanting, Honey Bottle, &dOminous Bottle&r.
quest.30798DFEB47F36F1.title: &aHedyrin's Possessions
quest.30BCD6DAC377A61D.quest_desc1: &aCarbon Fiber Strands&r now let you craft &aImproved Machine Cores&r (Tier 3).
quest.30BCD6DAC377A61D.title: Tier 3 Machine Cores
quest.30C2F5DF2A084982.quest_desc1: The &cFuel Generator&r is a 3x3x2 multiblock generator that consumes &3Crude Oil&r or &cTurbofuel&r to generate power.
quest.30C2F5DF2A084982.quest_desc3: &cTurbofuel&r provides the same RF/t, but lasts a lot longer!
quest.30C2F5DF2A084982.quest_desc5: This generator becomes available when you can craft the &dEnderic Lens&r, as well as mixing and making &3Crude Oil&r in the &6Mixer&r.
quest.30D00AC248214D58.quest_desc1: The &aEnergetic Alloy&r is used in some crafting recipes, but is most commonly used to craft &aDouble Layer Capacitors&r and &dVibrant Alloy&r
quest.30D00AC248214D58.title: &cEnergetic Alloy
quest.3147A88D91AF7EA6.quest_desc1: Defeat &cIgnis&r in the &cBurning Arena&r in the Lava Dimension.
quest.3147A88D91AF7EA6.quest_desc3: To summon him, you'll need to use &dBurning Ashes&r on the &cAltar of Fire&r in the center of the arena.
quest.3147A88D91AF7EA6.quest_desc5: This is a drop from Ignited Revenants that spawn in the arena.
quest.3147A88D91AF7EA6.title: Conqueror of the Flame
quest.3148FCED5BF543B5.quest_desc1: The &aTool Belt&r is the perfect place to store all of your tools in one place.
quest.3148FCED5BF543B5.quest_desc3: You can quickly access anything inside by holding down &aR&r to bring up a radial menu. These can also be upgraded using &aBelt Pouches&r, up to 9 total slots.
quest.314E9901D4E89E6F.quest_desc1: &c红石模块&r在物品进入路由器内部缓存时，可以释放红石信号。
quest.314E9901D4E89E6F.quest_desc3: 这对于自动化很有用，或者也能拿来控制其余模块开关！
quest.314E9901D4E89E6F.title: &f检测红石信号
quest.31705AD5BE50E2CB.quest_desc1: The &aPressurized Reaction Chamber&r is an advanced machine that combines 1 liquid, 1 gas, and 1 item to produce a new item, and sometimes a gas byproduct.
quest.31705AD5BE50E2CB.quest_desc3: This is used to make &6Ethene&r, &6HDPE Pellets&r, and more!
quest.31705AD5BE50E2CB.title: &fPressurized Reaction Chamber
quest.31B06C6ACEF764E0.quest_desc1: Before we can start crafting advanced technology, we'll need to find some &0Crude Oil&r first.
quest.31B06C6ACEF764E0.quest_desc3: This can be infinitely made in the &6Mixer&r from Nautec.
quest.31B06C6ACEF764E0.quest_subtitle: The U.S. Would Like To Know Your Location
quest.31B06C6ACEF764E0.title: &fThe Search For Oil!
quest.31EE85CB88AE2AAC.quest_desc1: This simple &bRitual&r allows you repair any chalk to full durability again.
quest.31EE85CB88AE2AAC.title: &cChalk Repairs
quest.322914E060D2583C.quest_desc1: If I can create a Vacuum, then I can replicate some sort of growth chamber!
quest.322914E060D2583C.quest_desc11: The speed that the crop grows is based on the soil that is used.
quest.322914E060D2583C.quest_desc13: You can find all of the soil speeds per growth cycle on the next 2 pages!
quest.322914E060D2583C.quest_desc3: Growing plants underwater is cool, but having a small chamber for them to grow in should make it much easier for me to control and speed up growth rates.
quest.322914E060D2583C.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Create or find a &2Garden Cloche&r to grow crops in.
quest.322914E060D2583C.quest_desc9: When given power and water, Garden Cloches can grow a single crop inside of them.
quest.3246845CBF6BD699.title: &fFerricore Leggings
quest.3251545A2BDA31AD.title: &fFerricore Helmet
quest.325D35004FF683C2.quest_desc1: &d量子计算机&r是最强大的多方块自动合成器，如果存储条件允许的话，它一次可以执行巨量任务！
quest.325D35004FF683C2.quest_desc3: &d量子计算机核心&r是这个多方块的重要组件，它相当于八核并行处理器，以及本身具有256M存储缓存。
quest.325D35004FF683C2.quest_desc5: 它本身就可以直接拿来自动合成，但如果搭建成多方块的话用处会更多。
quest.325D35004FF683C2.title: &f量子计算机&d的核心&f部件
quest.32D8D0691DF5B0F0.title: &fUpgrade: Negate Fall Damage
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc1: To summon higher tier &bSpirits&r, we're going to need better chalk.
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc3: This requires a new type of &bPentacle&r called &aEziveus' Spectral Compulsion&r. Make sure to use the guidebook to help you create it!
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc5: This is the basic starting point for &eBinding Rituals&r. It binds a &7Foliot&r to your items, enhancing their functionality.
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc7: Some &eBinding Rituals&r are optional, but you will need most of them if you want to reach &6Occultism&r's end-game.
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.title: &aThe Quest For More Chalk
quest.330F69D2F2626B50.quest_desc1: &a斑斓透镜&r射出的激光会穿透物品，然后改变它们本身的颜色，比如染色玻璃或玻璃板、地毯、染料、羊毛以及染色陶瓦。
quest.330F69D2F2626B50.title: &f斑斓透镜
quest.3334E05101A7297F.quest_desc1: &a反应仓&r是个处理速度非常快的机器，可以产生大部分AE2的材料，只不过耗能可能大了一点。
quest.3334E05101A7297F.quest_desc3: 你需要足够的电力储量，因为合成如果没有足够能量就不会开始。如果配方需要熔岩或水，直接泵入即可。
