quest.3334E05101A7297F.quest_desc5: 这台机器可以制造一些高阶材料，比如&6陨铁锭&r或&6陨青铜锭&r。
quest.3334E05101A7297F.title: &f反应仓&a
quest.334A319CC010293A.quest_desc1: Deep underwater, there is a small structure called the &6NauTec Ruins&r.
quest.334A319CC010293A.quest_desc3: Within this structure, there is a single &6Aquatic Catalyst&r.
quest.334A319CC010293A.title: &fTime For a &9Deep Dive
quest.337838FB759E4377.quest_desc1: I'm starting to think the &5Eldritch Gods&r might have had a hand in creating everything.
quest.337838FB759E4377.quest_desc3: ["To create ", {"text": "Magenta Chalk", "color": "#D17CC9"}, ", you will need ", {"text": "Dragonyst Dust", "color": "#FF55FF"}, "."]
quest.337838FB759E4377.quest_desc5: This can only be acquired by using the &6Uphyxes Inverted Tower&r Pentacle.
quest.337838FB759E4377.title: {"text": "Magenta Chalk", "color": "#D17CC9"}
quest.3389EB27CF459DB3.title: &fPeridot
quest.33A9FF901E2D7725.quest_desc1: 你需要&2钢质外壳&r才能合成该模组的机器！
quest.33A9FF901E2D7725.title: &a机器外壳&r
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.quest_desc1: If you're looking to grow &bMob Seeds&r to convert into their loot, you'll need a few things to get started.
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.quest_desc3: The simplest way to do this is by making &eEmpty Soul Jars&r, and then filling them inside a &6Soul Extractor&r. This works by placing in something the mob might drop to extract the mob essence into the Soul Jar. Check JEI for recipes!
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.quest_desc5: You can also use the &aSoulium Dagger&r to kill mobs to fill the &eSoul Jars&r in your inventory.
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.title: &fGrowing &bMobs
quest.33C16E82B90E5C1F.quest_desc1: &6Extreme Reactors&r is a powerful energy mod where you can build &aReactors&r and &dTurbines&r to harness &3Nuclear Power&r.
quest.33C16E82B90E5C1F.title: &fWelcome to &6Extreme Reactors&f!
quest.33E4C81B762892B2.quest_desc1: &6Oritech&r是个科技模组，里头有很多新机器和工具，会让你的科技旅途焕然一新！
quest.33E4C81B762892B2.quest_desc3: 这个模组下至基础矿物处理，上至建立&d粒子加速器&r……你想什么都可以用它实现！
quest.33E4C81B762892B2.quest_desc5: 你需要点&a粗镍&r，这玩意是这个模组的重要合成材料。
quest.33E4C81B762892B2.title: &6欢迎游玩Oritech！&r
quest.3404B0A29BF5A055.title: &fSimple Fluid Collector
quest.340D7F25B5EB0D33.quest_desc1: The next tier of Goo is called &dVoidshimmer Goo&r, and allows you to convert &bDiamond Blocks&r into &bCelestigems&r.
quest.340D7F25B5EB0D33.quest_desc3: To activate it, you'll need to feed it either Ender Pearls or Chorus Fruit.
quest.340D7F25B5EB0D33.quest_desc5: Just like previous tiers, this Goo can also produce the previous resources, and at a faster rate.
quest.340D7F25B5EB0D33.title: &fMaking &dCelestigems
quest.34169D76520A5D85.quest_desc1: The &bCharging Module&r can be placed on a pressure tube and it will charge all items in the inventory it's facing.
quest.34169D76520A5D85.quest_desc3: It can also discharge them if their &bPressure&r exceeds the Tube's.
quest.34169D76520A5D85.quest_desc5: If you put these on two connected &3Ender Chests&r you can effectively teleport &bAir Pressure&r!
quest.34169D76520A5D85.title: &fCharging Module
quest.3429ADCC43607897.quest_desc1: Have a problem with getting too many extra seeds? In the South, we call that a blessing. I think.
quest.3429ADCC43607897.quest_desc3: Run those extra seeds through a &aSeed Reprocessor&r to break them down into more essence!
quest.3429ADCC43607897.title: &fReprocessing &2Extra Seeds
quest.342F1C3D3A821B2B.title: &dSupremium &fGear
quest.344A14365BC03575.title: &f通用机械的物品管道
quest.3490E1E29396D066.title: &aTier 1 &fSeeds
quest.349143B50076A759.quest_desc1: Each &6Tier 4 Dimensional Storage Stablizer&r adds 4096000 items, and 512 item types, up to four &aStablizers&r.
quest.349143B50076A759.title: &6Tier 4 Dimensional Storage Stabilizer
quest.34C8F98F68B133B5.title: &bImperium &fGear
quest.34CB13A91DB2E871.quest_desc1: The &dParadox Machine&r is one of the most unique machines you will ever make.
quest.34CB13A91DB2E871.quest_desc3: This machine can take a snapshot of an area and &6rewind time&r for the area back to the time of the snapshot.
quest.34CB13A91DB2E871.quest_desc5: This means placing blocks, harvesting them, then rewinding to harvest again.
quest.34CB13A91DB2E871.quest_desc7: To learn more of the uses and &cdangers&r of using the machine, refer to the guide book!
quest.34CB13A91DB2E871.title: &fThe &dParadox Machine
quest.34D191F76AA69707.quest_desc1: &6通量网络&r是无线能源方面的最强模组！
quest.34D191F76AA69707.quest_desc3: 首先你需要用基岩和黑曜石碾碎&c红石粉&r，然后捡起制造出的&d通量粉尘&r。
quest.34D191F76AA69707.quest_desc5: 首先找到一块基岩，然后在基岩顶上丢点红石粉，之后在红石粉所在格子上面放下黑曜石。一切就绪后左击黑曜石即可粉碎红石，产出&d通量粉尘&r。
quest.34D191F76AA69707.quest_desc7: Flux Dust is the main crafting material for all blocks within the mod.
quest.34D191F76AA69707.quest_desc9: Use this to make the &aFlux Configurator&r, which shows all power networks you have access to and allows you to remotely manage all devices connected to that network.
quest.34D191F76AA69707.title: &6通量网络
quest.34DA4C91DEADF93D.quest_desc1: &aMemory Chips&r can store matter values for up to 16 items each.
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc10: 想要合成魔符？首先拿着法术书右击抄写台，这样就能打开魔符面板！
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc13: 界面中会显示你目前可以制造的全部魔符，其中也包括你已经学到过的魔符。你可以在右边以等级来筛选搜索结果，或者直接搜索特定魔符。
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc15: 如果硬要说先做哪一个魔符的话，就做&a魔符：强化&r吧！首先搜索它，搜索到后点进去查看你所需要的材料，最后点选择就行。
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc17: 然后退出界面，拿着所需物品右击你的抄写台，静观其变就行！
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc2: 这就是我之前和你说的魔法桌子！
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc4: 把这个桌子合成出来，然后把它放下来，用它研究并合成新的&d魔符&r。魔符是合成咒语的基础物资，它可以让你学到更多的咒语。
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc6: 那么咱就来学学怎么合成魔符吧！
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.quest_desc8: 注意，魔符也是分等级的。如果你手头的法术书是&a初学者法术书&r的话，你就只能用它施放一阶魔符。如果想要施放高阶魔符的话，你就需要升级你的法术书。
quest.34EC72BBCD9F197F.title: &b抄写台&r
quest.34FA9DF0A6D2163D.title: &fSapphire
quest.3547CF22215AB10A.title: &f有用的&a三阶&r魔符
quest.355C3ACB16CC2DE9.quest_desc1: &6多方块量子计算机&r内部可以用各种方块随意填充。
quest.355C3ACB16CC2DE9.quest_desc3: 每个&6量子计算机加速器&r相当于八个并行处理器，考虑一下多装点吧。
quest.355C3ACB16CC2DE9.title: &f量子加速&d
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc1: The &cMachine Operator&r transfers items specified in the &aDimensional Storage Actuator's&r interface to its managed machine and brings back the crafting results.
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc3: It can also be used to automatically empty a chest into the &aStorage Actuator&r.
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc5: To use the &cMachine Operator&r use its &aBook of Calling&r to link a &aStorage Actuator&r, the machine, and optionally a separate extract location.
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc7: For the machine you can additionally set a custom name and the insert/extract sides. Please note that setting a new machine will reset the extraction settings
quest.357591103765D4EF.title: &cDjinni Machine Operator
quest.3578757A7E8F3B37.quest_desc1: The &dSplitter&r is used to split the Source that is directed towards it into multiple Source Jars at once!
quest.3578757A7E8F3B37.quest_desc3: This Relay has a much larger through-put than a regular Source Relay.
quest.3578757A7E8F3B37.title: &dSource Splitting
quest.35A457C89558CF59.title: &cTertium &fWatering Can
quest.35B5935902738DCC.quest_desc1: The &bConfigurator&r is the ultimate wrench in Mekanism.
quest.35B5935902738DCC.quest_desc3: This tool has several configuration modes which can be switched by sneaking and scrolling your mouse wheel. To use the tool, sneak-use it on a pipe or machine!
quest.35B5935902738DCC.quest_desc5: When set to &dWrench&r, this will automatically break the block up for you. Rotate does exactly what you think it does.
quest.35B5935902738DCC.quest_desc7: Using any mode like Items or Fluids, this will configure pipes to push or pull.
quest.35B5935902738DCC.title: &bConfigurator
quest.35C3D3804B3E3B9B.title: &dCelestigem Boots
quest.35E0EDF360749CC9.title: &fUpgrade: Elytra
quest.35ED26A5855FBBBA.quest_desc1: The &6Chemical Dissolution Chamber&r uses &eSulfuric Acid&r to break down materials into a gas.
quest.35ED26A5855FBBBA.quest_desc3: For us to use it in our ore processing line, we'll first need to combine the &aSulfur Trioxide&r with &aWater Vapor&r in a Chemical Infuser. This will give us the &eSulfuric Acid&r we need to break down the materials!
quest.35ED26A5855FBBBA.quest_desc5: Once you have a steady supply of Acid, the &6Chemical Dissolution Chamber&r will serve as the starting machine in the next tier of ore processing. It breaks down 1 raw ore into 1 bucket of Dirty Ore Slurry. Just as an FYI, this is a gas!
quest.35ED26A5855FBBBA.title: &6Chemical Dissolution Chamber
quest.35FFAC447F36F05C.quest_desc1: After we've exposed &aEmpty PCBs&r to &bUV Light&r, we can take the next step in the process by making an &2Etching Tank&r.
quest.35FFAC447F36F05C.quest_desc11: If you want to automate this, you can extract &dUnassembled PCBs&r from the sides, and &cFailed PCBs&r from the top or bottom.
quest.35FFAC447F36F05C.quest_desc3: Once the machine has some &bEtching Acid&r inside, insert an &aEmpty PCB&r that has been exposed in a &bUV Light Box.&r
quest.35FFAC447F36F05C.quest_desc5: &cThis process has a chance to fail!&r
quest.35FFAC447F36F05C.quest_desc7: If you want the tank to work faster, you can heat it above 50°C, but the &2Etching Acid&r will slowly be used up due to the &cHeat&r.
quest.35FFAC447F36F05C.quest_desc9: If the etching was successful, you willl get an &dUnassembled PCB&r as a result. If the process fails, you'll get a &cFailed PCB&r instead.
quest.35FFAC447F36F05C.title: &fEtching PCBs
quest.361957009F62D810.quest_desc1: There will be a time where you try to pump in certain chemicals or liquids into a machine, and the wrong one goes in.
quest.361957009F62D810.quest_desc3: Using the &aGauge Dropper&r, you can easily remove any liquids or chemicals from a machine. Open the machine up and pick up the dropper, then interact with the tank to remove the fluid or gas!
quest.361957009F62D810.quest_desc5: Left Click - Will collect up to 1 bucket of gas/fluid and stores it in the dropper.
quest.361957009F62D810.quest_desc7: Right Click - Will deposit whatever is in the dropper into the tank.
quest.361957009F62D810.quest_desc9: Sneak-Left Click - Dumps the entire tank
quest.361957009F62D810.title: &aRemoving Gases from Machines
quest.366F506F69C65F28.title: &f物品导管
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc1: Some Famliars like to dance, especially the &dDrygmy&r.
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc11: When used, your new Drygmy friend will make its home within 10 blocks of that Cobblestone block, which should convert into a &2Drygmy Hedge&r.
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc13: Any mob within 10 blocks will also be "farmed" by the Drygmy, so they will need a place to store the items! Beside the Hedge, make sure to place down a chest for storage. Each time the Drygmy tries to obtain drops from a mob, it will require Source. This means you'll need a Source Jar as well!
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc17: To increase the amount of drops from the mobs, you can always make more Drygmys, but the best way is to make the Drygmy happy. For each unique type of entity within the 10 block area, it increases the overall happiness of the Drygmy. And we definitely like to make them happy!
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc19: Since you probably don't want hostile creatures running around, the Drygmy can also harvest items from mobs placed inside &aContainment Jars&r as well. Make sure to check out how to capture mobs using the Containment Ritual!
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc3: These little magical beings can extract mob loot from nearby monsters or animals without the need of slaying them. Because of this, they are great to use for mob farms!
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc5: You'll first have to find one in the wild, then befriend it by throwing it a Wilden Horn. They love those!
quest.3684E99D50168389.quest_desc9: Once befriended, you'll get a &dDrygmy Charm&r. This can be used on a &2Mossy Cobblestone&r block where you'd like to set up the mob farm.
quest.3684E99D50168389.title: &dDrygmy &bFarms
quest.368CF829E37E0945.quest_desc1: The &aBarbed Band&r significantly amplifies the &bBanding Material&r effect but deals damage to the player whenever the player attacks.
quest.368CF829E37E0945.quest_desc3: All &aGems&r cab be used to amplify the effects of the &aBanding&r with the following multipliers:
quest.368CF829E37E0945.title: &fBarbed Band
quest.36E0D875AA8E2F66.quest_desc1: After making a trip to the Deep Dark, you can make the final tier of goo: &5Shadowflame Goo&r.
quest.36E0D875AA8E2F66.quest_desc3: This Goo can convert &6Netherite Blocks&r into &5Eclipse Alloy Ore&r.
quest.36E0D875AA8E2F66.quest_desc5: To activate it, you'll need to feed it either Sculk or Sculk Catalysts.
quest.36E0D875AA8E2F66.quest_desc7: Just like previous tiers, this can also convert all previous ingot blocks at an increased rate.
quest.36E0D875AA8E2F66.title: &5Ore of the Eclipse
quest.3710743E7B4F073D.quest_desc1: &6Gold&r is great for electronic components, but it is also highly sought after for rituals.
quest.3710743E7B4F073D.quest_desc3: Having some should allow me to create a new way to &2Infuse&r materials that are more magical in nature.
quest.3710743E7B4F073D.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Use &6Gold&r to create 8 &aInfusion Pedastals&r and an &2Infusion Altar&r.
quest.3710743E7B4F073D.title: A Mystical Infusion
quest.371D1FEFBD49CCFF.quest_desc1: The &bCelestigem Sword&r is the next tier sword for the mod that can use &cEnergy&r instead of durability!
quest.371D1FEFBD49CCFF.quest_desc3: This can hold the same upgrades as before, with the addition of the &dDrops Teleport Upgrade&r.
quest.371D1FEFBD49CCFF.title: &dCelestigem Sword
quest.37313F95E939A6F5.quest_desc1: The &dAlchemical Sourcelink&r generates Source by consuming potions from adjacent &aPotion Jars&r. The amount of Source generated depends on the complexity of the potion. The longer the potion lasts and the overall level of the potion will generate a bonus amount of Source, with multipliers for each effect a potion contains.
quest.37313F95E939A6F5.quest_desc3: If you're looking to automate this, you should look into making friends with &dWixies&r!
quest.37313F95E939A6F5.title: &dAlchemical Sourcelink
quest.37CA431C28D82E55.quest_desc1: This marvel of engineering is capable of accelerating various projectiles, like Iron Rods, to very high speeds.
quest.37CA431C28D82E55.quest_desc3: To use the &dRailgun&r, have an accepted type of projectile in your inventory and hold-use the gun to charge it. Release to let it fire!
quest.37CA431C28D82E55.quest_desc5: The &dRailgun&r deals different amounts of damage depending on the projectile shot by using a small amount of power.
quest.37CA431C28D82E55.quest_desc7: It is recommended to use it with an &aAccumulator Backpack&r!
quest.37CA431C28D82E55.quest_desc9: It can also be modified in the &aEngineer's Workbench&r and customized with &bShaders&r.
quest.37CA431C28D82E55.title: &dRailgun
quest.38248F3AE03BE9F7.quest_desc1: The &dAfrit Smelter&r functions like all other &bSmelters&r, but processes things 90% faster than normal.
quest.38248F3AE03BE9F7.title: &dAfrit Smelter
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc1: If we want to play with &cDemons&r, we'll need a way to summon them with rituals. To do this, we need &aChalk&r.
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc3: &aChalk&r is used to draw glyphs for your &bRituals&r. You will come across many different colored &aChalks&r as you progress through &6Occultism&r.
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc5: By combining &aOtherworld Ashes&r and &aBurnt Otherstone&r, you can craft an &7Impure White Chalk&r, which can be thrown into &aSpirit Fire&r to purify it into &aWhite Chalk&r.
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc7: Chalk is pretty hard to scrub off of the ground. You can use a &aChalk Brush&r to get rid of any misplaced glyphs.
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.title: &fWhite Chalk
quest.38705F990589B2E8.quest_desc1: The &dIesnium Sacrificial Bowl&r is an upgrade to the standard &aGolden Sacrifical Bowl&r.
quest.38705F990589B2E8.title: &dIesnium Sacrificial Bowl
quest.388014ECCC529C2C.quest_desc1: The &aDisintegrator&r breaks down items into matter.
quest.388014ECCC529C2C.quest_desc3: Different things provide different amounts and types of matter, which is used to replicate items.
quest.388014ECCC529C2C.quest_desc5: Despite having an internal tank, it is advisable to store matter inside of &aMatter Tanks&r.
quest.38869642A2E6F8B6.quest_desc1: &6模块化路由器&r可以解决你的一切路由问题，这个模组可以实现&a自动点击&r，&r自动方块破坏&r，还有很多别的功能！
quest.38869642A2E6F8B6.quest_desc3: 上述所有不可思议的功能都是靠主方块完成的，即&a模块化路由器&r。你首先要给路由器安装&a模块&r来“告诉”路由器应该干什么，这样它才能正常运转。模块可以用&a拓展&r来改装和升级。
quest.38869642A2E6F8B6.quest_desc5: 路由器本体也可以加装不同的&a升级&r，加装的升级决定了里头的模块如何运作。
quest.38869642A2E6F8B6.quest_desc7: 初始路由器只有一个物品缓存槽，可以装一组物品。
quest.38869642A2E6F8B6.quest_desc9: 你可以升级路由器，加装特定升级和模块后，它就可以存储&9流体&r和&c能量&r。
quest.38869642A2E6F8B6.title: &6模块化路由器
quest.389A8206E7B3A22C.title: &fSimple Block Placer
quest.38BD69DD1995E971.quest_desc1: 当你有提纯仓，粉碎机以及富集仓后，就足够搭建&9二阶矿物处理线&r的材料了。搭建好后一个粗矿就可以生产出三个锭。
quest.38BD69DD1995E971.quest_desc3: 首先，粗矿要进&a提纯仓&r。提纯仓消耗&a电离分离器&r制造出的&a氧气&r，将粗矿变为&e矿物碎块&r。
quest.38BD69DD1995E971.quest_desc5: 然后，矿物碎块要进&a粉碎机&r。粉碎机会把它变成&a污浊粉尘&r。
quest.38BD69DD1995E971.quest_desc7: 最后，污浊粉尘放进&a富集仓&r。富集仓可以把污浊矿粉净化为矿粉，矿粉直接熔炼就出锭了。
quest.38BD69DD1995E971.title: &9二阶矿物处理线&r
quest.38D3BE7AF6792B8D.quest_desc1: With the power of &9Blue Chalk&r and &dWither Skeleton Skulls&r you are able to summon and bind &6Marids&r into powerful beings.
quest.38D3BE7AF6792B8D.quest_desc3: Most &ePossesion&r and &eFamiliar Rituals&r are optional, but you will still need to complete their &bPentacles&r to reach the end-game.
quest.38D3BE7AF6792B8D.quest_desc5: Simply click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
quest.38E07A5510D2ACEC.quest_desc1: Using &aHedyrin's Lure&r you can summon &ePossessed Animals&r that can be tamed or killed for loot.
quest.38E07A5510D2ACEC.quest_desc5: &aRandom Common Animal&r: One of - Chicken, Cow, Pig, Sheep, Squid, or Wolf
quest.38E07A5510D2ACEC.quest_desc7: &aRandom Small Animal&r: One of - Allay, Bat, Bee, Parrot, Cat, Ocelot, Fox, or Rabbit
quest.38E07A5510D2ACEC.quest_desc9: &aRandom Water Animal&r: One of - Axolotl, Frog, Dolphin, Cod, Salmon, Tropical Fish, Pufferfish, Squid, Glow Squid, Tadpole, Turtle, or Snow Golem
quest.38E07A5510D2ACEC.title: &aHedyrin's Animals
quest.38EA9FAD11870423.quest_desc1: I don't believe I'll ever make it to the home of the Enderman, but I believe I can at least harness the power from the &dEnd&r.
quest.38EA9FAD11870423.quest_desc3: I'll need a &oton&r of Ender Pearls for this to work, though.
quest.38EA9FAD11870423.quest_desc7: Note: To complete the craft, you will need at least one &dEnder Alternator&r within a 7x7 area from the Ender Crafter. The more you have, the faster it crafts.
quest.38EA9FAD11870423.title: Power Of The End
quest.38FBC8ECE9138452.quest_desc1: The &aItem Collector&r from &dJust Dire Things&r is a highly configurable collector.
quest.38FBC8ECE9138452.quest_desc3: Inside of the interface, you can adjust the radius up to a max of 11x11x11, but can also offset where the machine collects if needed.
quest.38FBC8ECE9138452.quest_desc5: You can also adjust even more options like filtering which items it can pick up, or how fast it picks items up.
quest.38FBC8ECE9138452.title: &dJustDire's &fItem Collector
quest.3900E67C8B833980.quest_desc1: &aArtisan Scrolls&r can be found while exploring the world
quest.3900E67C8B833980.quest_desc3: To learn a &bJewel&r blueprint simply right-click with an &aArtisan Scroll&r in hand.
quest.3900E67C8B833980.title: &fArtisan Scrolls
quest.39217B517F7C280A.quest_desc1: To craft and use the highest tier spells, you'll need to have proven yourself worthy by defeating the &5Wilden Chimera&r.
quest.39217B517F7C280A.quest_desc3: With the Wilden Tribute (and some other vanilla end game materials), you'll be able to upgrade your spell book to the highest tier!
quest.39217B517F7C280A.title: &6The Archmage Spell Book
quest.393850960DC22BB1.quest_desc1: 如果想要从模块化路由器中输入输出物品，需要加装一些&a模块&r。
quest.393850960DC22BB1.quest_desc3: 安装了&a发送&r和&a抽取模块1型&r的路由器可以和相邻的存储方块交互。
quest.393850960DC22BB1.quest_desc5: 你需要安装&a分配模块&r才能无线输出物品，分配模块对路由器作用范围内的八个存储方块起效。
quest.393850960DC22BB1.quest_desc7: 如果想要无线抽取物品的话，给路由器加装&a抽取模块 Mk2&r就可以把物品抽取到路由器中。
quest.393850960DC22BB1.title: &f存储和提取
quest.3964E9A95D52B0FD.quest_desc1: The next tier of &bSummoning Pentacle&r is &dAbras' Fortified Conjure&r.
quest.3964E9A95D52B0FD.quest_desc3: This &bRitual&r is only used to summon an &6Unbound Marid&r. Killing it will grant you its essence, allowing you to make &9Blue Chalk&r.
quest.3964E9A95D52B0FD.title: &dAbras' Fortified Conjure
quest.39751E377C0F22EE.quest_desc1: The &aReplication Terminal&r shows all matter and available replication blocks in your network.
quest.39751E377C0F22EE.quest_desc3: You can also use the &aReplication Terminal&r to request, cancel, or view ongoing replication requests.
quest.39751E377C0F22EE.quest_desc5: Replication requests will be output in the bottom rows of the &aReplication Terminal&r.
quest.39751E377C0F22EE.quest_desc7: To view ongoing requests, click the &eReplication Tasks&r icon at the very top-right of the interface, next to the search bar.
quest.39751E377C0F22EE.title: &fViewing Your Network
quest.3985170CDB3A0BC3.quest_desc1: To craft &cInanite&r, insert two &dRidiculite&r ingots and one bucket of &bLiquid &cRossinite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.3985170CDB3A0BC3.title: &cInanite
quest.39860652342C4E57.quest_desc1: I step forward. T&lhe Rift collapses behind me.&r
quest.39860652342C4E57.quest_desc11: The anomaly isn’t gone. The ocean world, the Rift...
quest.39860652342C4E57.quest_desc12: &l all of it still lingers&r at the edge of reality.
quest.39860652342C4E57.quest_desc14: I escaped. But did I stop it?
quest.39860652342C4E57.quest_desc16: Was that world just the beginning?
quest.39860652342C4E57.quest_desc3: For the first time in what feels like forever, I breathe air that isn’t trying to kill me. A real horizon stretches ahead- familiar, steady, not actively breaking the laws of physics.
quest.39860652342C4E57.quest_desc5: For a moment, peace settles in.
quest.39860652342C4E57.title: Log Entry 018
quest.39F711F28B0FCABA.quest_desc1: Cyanite is the main waste process when a passive &dReator&r burns uranium fuel.
quest.39F711F28B0FCABA.quest_desc3: Cyanite can be turned into Blutonium in a reprocessor, or used to craft machine parts.
quest.39F711F28B0FCABA.title: &bCyanite&r
quest.39FD7A010B791999.quest_desc1: Collect &6Time Crystals&r from the Rift, and craft a &6Time Crystal Block&r.
quest.39FD7A010B791999.title: Master Of Time
quest.3A55DAA85874864A.quest_desc1: The &aChest Vacuum&r pulls nearby items into its inventory.
quest.3A55DAA85874864A.quest_desc3: The &aXP Vacuum&r pulls nearby experience orbs into its inventory.
quest.3A55DAA85874864A.title: &fOther Useful Machines
quest.3A59D1773EBD3B8A.quest_desc1: 想把你的AE网络延伸到第二个地方，但是线缆够不到？比如另一个维度？搭建一个&d量子桥&r就可以轻松链接！
quest.3A59D1773EBD3B8A.quest_desc3: 你必须搭建两个重要多方块结构才能构建量子桥：一个连通主网，另一个链接到想延伸网络的地方。
quest.3A59D1773EBD3B8A.quest_desc5: 每个多方块结构都必须有&b八个量子环&r，中间需要摆放&6ME量子链接仓&r。你需要制造出&d量子纠缠奇点&r并安装在链接仓，这样才能把两个环链接起来。
quest.3A59D1773EBD3B8A.quest_desc7: 无论你把线缆怼在哪，这个量子环都只能承受128条频道。而且只有紧靠链接仓的量子环方块才能链接，边角是不作数的。
quest.3A59D1773EBD3B8A.quest_desc9: 注意：两边区块必须都加载才能正常工作。
quest.3A59D1773EBD3B8A.title: &6量子桥
quest.3A5A665B1F76BE26.quest_desc1: &6Pneumatic Armor&r can be extensively upgraded at the cost of having a fairly low base defense.
quest.3A5A665B1F76BE26.quest_desc3: These upgrades can give it more Armor, Armor Toughness, Speed, Flight, Night vision, and more!
quest.3A5A665B1F76BE26.quest_desc5: The &aChestplate&r can also be upgraded to charge all of your pneumatic devices.
quest.3A5A665B1F76BE26.quest_desc7: This armor does not have infinite durability like some other tech armors, but can be upgraded to automatically repair with pressure.
quest.3A5A665B1F76BE26.title: &fI am (Compressed) Iron Man!
quest.3AC24F0B92156F55.quest_desc1: The &dAssembler&r features a 2x2 crafting grid and will automatically assemble items as long as it has energy, items in the input slots, and space for the finished product in the output slot.
quest.3AC24F0B92156F55.quest_desc3: Some machine components can be crafted without an &aAssembler&r, but doing so consumes more resources.
quest.3AC24F0B92156F55.title: &fThe &dAssembler&r
quest.3ACEBC2F651514F4.quest_desc1: The &aLeaf-Eating Generator&r will consume leaves in a 7 block radius to generate power.
quest.3AEBDB8CAA13C522.quest_desc1: &a磁力戒指&r在有充能的情况下，会自动拾取玩家身边6格的掉落物。
quest.3AEBDB8CAA13C522.title: &a磁力戒指
quest.3AF4B31403FE9E0D.title: &2Prudentium &fArmor
quest.3AF598F0517B7BA6.quest_desc1: The &aStable Wormhole&r allows access to a Dimensional Storage from a remote destination.
quest.3AF598F0517B7BA6.quest_desc3: Shift-click the &aDimensional Storage Actuator&r to link it, then place the &aStable Wormhole&r in the world to use as a remote access point.
quest.3AF598F0517B7BA6.title: &aRemote Network Access
quest.3AFF8BDCBD25F9F3.quest_desc1: &aCapacitor Banks&r are used to store energy!
quest.3AFF8BDCBD25F9F3.quest_desc3: These are easily configurable within the interface. You can also stack these together to make multiblock power banks.
quest.3AFF8BDCBD25F9F3.title: &fBasic Capacitor Bank
quest.3B09C6E08E35AA20.quest_desc1: This coal contains 3 times as much power as &aPrimal Coal&r.
quest.3B09C6E08E35AA20.quest_desc3: It can also be refined into &cBlaze Ember Fuel&r for even more power!
quest.3B09C6E08E35AA20.title: &cBlaze Ember
quest.3B2115D3C8C3A486.title: &fAdvanced Capacitor Bank
quest.3B2B26B1AD947CC5.quest_desc1: The &aLarge Energy Storage&r holds a base value of 20M RF which can be upgraded with &bAddons&r.
quest.3B2B26B1AD947CC5.quest_desc3: The &aLarge Energy Storage&r accepts energy from all green ports but can only output through the single red port. A redstone signal will disable all energy output.
quest.3B37556B49098933.quest_desc1: The &aOtherworld Goggles&r give the wearer permanent &bThird Eye&r effect, granting vision of &9Otherworld&r blocks.
quest.3B37556B49098933.title: &aOtherworld Goggles
quest.3B6CDE92B84CBFE5.quest_desc1: The &aDrill&r works like a pickaxe and a shovel when charged, and it can be upgraded by sneak-right-clicking with it in your hand.
quest.3B6CDE92B84CBFE5.quest_desc3: 下一个任务中将会介绍所有的&b钻头拓展&r。
quest.3B6CDE92B84CBFE5.title: &f浅蓝色钻头
quest.3BAE611AE4CEA7A6.quest_desc1: ["You'll find lots of old ", {"text":"rusty items", "color": "#D5510E"}, " from loot crates or underwater mobs."]
quest.3BAE611AE4CEA7A6.quest_desc3: ["You can remove the ", {"text": "rust", "color": "#D5510E"}, " by making some ", {"text": "Etching Acid", "color": "#55FF55"}, " then placing it down and throwing your items in them. It takes a few seconds."]
quest.3BAE611AE4CEA7A6.title: [{"text": "Removing The ", "color": "#FFFFFF"}, {"text":"Rust", "color": "#D5510E"}]
quest.3BCB8667CCEBAE57.quest_desc1: The &aStorage Actuator Base&r is the first of two parts needed to access your storage dimension.
quest.3BCB8667CCEBAE57.quest_desc3: This block functions very much like a big shulker box. This means that when breaking the &aDimensional Storage Actuator&r, your items will stay safe inside the block.
quest.3BCB8667CCEBAE57.title: &aStorage Actuator Base
quest.3BD6FEDB8CFAC914.quest_desc1: Refining &aAcetaldehyde&r and &aCreosote Oil&r together produces &aPhenolic Resin&r, which is used in the creation of plastics.
quest.3BD6FEDB8CFAC914.title: &fPhenolic Resin
quest.3BFF8EFB5E7186A4.quest_desc1: 多方块&6量子计算机&r内部可以用不同方块填充。
quest.3BFF8EFB5E7186A4.quest_desc3: &6量子计算机储存方块&r可以高效提升一次可执行的线程。
quest.3BFF8EFB5E7186A4.title: &f量子存储
quest.3C03D41F5B1A8BDC.quest_desc1: The &bArcanist Set&r is made from Iron Armor, and is more of the middle ground for those who want more defense, but don't want to give up the higher tier thread slots.
quest.3C03D41F5B1A8BDC.title: &bArcanist Set
quest.3C0D9DFFEC915E2C.title: &f流体导管
quest.3C2474BD20BCA2CD.quest_desc1: Breakthrough! or was it Eureka? At any rate, I've got Electricity.
quest.3C2474BD20BCA2CD.quest_desc10: Time to pick up the pace.
quest.3C2474BD20BCA2CD.quest_desc3: Steam was fun and all, but I’ve officially graduated from the 1800s... With salvaged circuits and refined metals, I’ve managed to generate Forge Energy... not much, but enough to power my growing collection of barely-held-together machinery.
quest.3C2474BD20BCA2CD.quest_desc7: Automation can expand, systems can run longer, and maybe... just maybe... I can create a dive suit capable of withstanding the crushing depths below. But even with power, this place doesn’t feel any safer. Something is out there. Beneath the waves. Watching. Waiting.
quest.3C2474BD20BCA2CD.quest_desc8: Whatever it is, I’d really rather not meet it.
quest.3C2474BD20BCA2CD.title: Log Entry 007
quest.3C25B0FAC773D70A.quest_desc1: The &6Enchanter's Wand&r can be inscribed with a single spell. By default, the wand will automatically use Projectile -> Accelerate for the inscribed spell.
quest.3C25B0FAC773D70A.quest_desc3: For example, to create a wand that is used to break blocks, the inscribed spell can just be Break by itself, or can be Break + Augments. When used with the wand, it will cast Projectile -> Accelerate -> Break.
quest.3C25B0FAC773D70A.title: &fEnchanter's Wand
quest.3C2916E5CA485AEA.quest_desc1: With your new machines, you can now create &dTier 5&r and &dTier 6&r Machine Cores!
quest.3C2916E5CA485AEA.title: Machine Core Upgrades!
quest.3C68BDD7D3C09412.quest_desc1: Now that I can swim a little bit deeper, I can finally see what these giant floating spheres are in the water.
quest.3C68BDD7D3C09412.quest_desc3: &6&o&nTASK&r: Locate and swim to an &bAE2 Underwater Meteor&r. Break through and find the &dMysterious Cube&r.
quest.3C68BDD7D3C09412.title: Floating Meteors
quest.3CAA89E621ED5B6E.quest_desc1: The &aCamouflage Applicator&r can make camouflageable blocks such as tubes and heat pipes look like other blocks!
quest.3CAA89E621ED5B6E.quest_desc3: Sneak + Right Click the applicator on a block (like grass or diamond) then click on any camouflageable block to set its appearance.
quest.3CAA89E621ED5B6E.title: &fCamouflage Applicator
quest.3CADD463CFC2FE32.quest_desc1: The &aThermoelectric Generator&r uses the temperature differential between the blocks on either side of it to generate &aLV&r power.
quest.3CADD463CFC2FE32.quest_desc3: This means that you need to place one cold block/fluid and one hot block/fluid on opposite sides of the block to generate power.
quest.3CADD463CFC2FE32.quest_desc5: You can check the &aEngineer's Manual&r or JEI for a list of compatible blocks.
quest.3CADD463CFC2FE32.title: &fThermoelectric Generator
quest.3CC776328188FE33.quest_desc1: [ "With access to ", {"text": "Prometheum", "color": "#FCD205"}, " you can now craft the final tier of cores: The ", {"text": "Ultimate Machine Core", "color": "#FF55FF"}, "!"]
quest.3CC776328188FE33.title: &fThe &dUltimate Machine Core
quest.3CF48BB941321C47.quest_desc1: The &aBottling Machine&r is a &bHeavy Machine&r that fills containers, molds, and other items with fluids.
quest.3CF48BB941321C47.quest_desc3: To help build and learn more about the machine, make sure to check the &bEngineer's Manual&r!
quest.3CF48BB941321C47.title: &fBottling Machine
quest.3D0DC34C36A173F5.quest_desc1: You now have all the resources to craft the &cExo Armor&r! It is a specialized suit designed to assist you on your adventures, with each piece offering unique benefits:
quest.3D0DC34C36A173F5.quest_desc9: Boots: Grants immunity to fall damage.
quest.3D0DC34C36A173F5.title: &cExo Armor
quest.3D767C3E2F0DE320.quest_desc1: 多方块&6量子计算机&r的结构是3x3，4x4，5x5的正方体。
quest.3D767C3E2F0DE320.quest_desc3: 最小的量子计算机必须有一个&6量子计算机核心&r，框架和六个面必须全都是&d量子结构方块&r。4x4x4的多方块中至少要有56个结构方块。
quest.3D767C3E2F0DE320.quest_desc5: 多方块内部空格可以用&d量子合成单元&r填充，除此之外没别的用处。
quest.3D767C3E2F0DE320.title: &f量子&d计算机&f的搭建蓝图
quest.3D9FFFF325533514.quest_desc1: Double byproduct amount in &aFragment Forge&r. Increases block breaking yield in &aDestroyer Blocks&r and &aEnderic Lasers&r.
quest.3DA0BFEF3DD6B003.quest_desc1: This dimension seems to be inhabited by strange looking Pigs.
quest.3DA0BFEF3DD6B003.quest_desc3: They've made massive &6Fortresses&r that protect them from the Lava, but most of it seems taken over by other mobs here.
quest.3DA0BFEF3DD6B003.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Visit a &6Fortress&r and collect &cNether Wart&r and &cBlaze Rods&r.
quest.3DA0BFEF3DD6B003.title: What Could They Be Hiding?
quest.3DA1FF3D18606AD6.quest_desc1: The &cBlazegold Pickaxe&r is a major upgrade for mining!
quest.3DA1FF3D18606AD6.quest_desc3: This pickaxe allows for two new upgrades: &aHammer&r and &cAutosmelt&r. It also can be repaired by throwing it into &cLava&r.
quest.3DA1FF3D18606AD6.title: &cBlazegold Pickaxe
quest.3DCE47D571CF44E6.quest_desc1: The &aCreature Catcher&r allows you to easily capture mobs!
quest.3DCE47D571CF44E6.quest_desc3: Just right click to throw it and capture a mob. To release it, just throw it again.
quest.3DCE47D571CF44E6.title: &fCreature Catcher
quest.3DDEFC2521CAF3BA.quest_desc1: &cHeat&r is what actually generates energy within the &dReactor&r.
quest.3DDEFC2521CAF3BA.quest_desc3: Irradiated fuel heats up, &eModerators&r absorb part of the radiation and move heat away from the &aFuel Rods&r.
quest.3DDEFC2521CAF3BA.quest_desc5: &aCasing &cHeat&r is what actually generates energy or vaporizes &bCoolants&r.
quest.3DDEFC2521CAF3BA.quest_desc7: Moving &cHeat&r away from the &aFuel Rods&r is a very important aspect of your reactor design, and &eModerators&r play a key role in that.
quest.3DDEFC2521CAF3BA.title: &fManaging &cHeat
quest.3E00AA33AC5304F9.quest_desc1: 当把&a蚯蚓&r放置在草方块或泥土上后，它就会为它周边3x3的方块自动耕地、浇水。还能提升作物生长速度。
quest.3E00AA33AC5304F9.quest_desc3: 你可以通过用锄头锄地来获取&a蚯蚓&r，把它所在的方块打破就可以将其移除。
quest.3E00AA33AC5304F9.title: &fWorm
quest.3E1D73D9FEAF119F.quest_desc1: To make the strongest alloys and circuits, we'll need to create &dRefined Obisidan Dust&r.
quest.3E1D73D9FEAF119F.quest_desc3: To do this, we can crush down some obsidian into &9Obsidian Dust&r, then infuse that dust with &bEnriched Diamonds&r in a Metallurgic Infuser.
quest.3E1D73D9FEAF119F.quest_desc5: While this can go directly into the infusion slot in an Infuser, you might as well enrich it first to get the best bang for your buck!
quest.3E1D73D9FEAF119F.title: &dRefined Obsidian Dust
quest.3E37D6522BE4EB9B.title: &bImperium &fArmor
quest.3E63D54D05A3E300.quest_desc1: If you run &eBrine&r through another Thermal Evap Tower, it'll convert it into &6Liquid Lithium&r.
quest.3E63D54D05A3E300.quest_desc3: We can't do much with Liquid Lithium, so we'll need to convert it into a gas using a &aRotary Condensentrator&r.
quest.3E63D54D05A3E300.quest_desc5: With &6Lithium Gas&r, we can do so much more!
quest.3E63D54D05A3E300.title: &6Liquid Lithium
quest.3E7E07DB49639EA5.quest_desc1: 用你的冶金灌注机和&c红石&r制作基础&a合金&r与&a电路&r吧！把产物组合起来就可以做出&c高级控制电路&r，这种电路可以制造更先进的机器。
quest.3E7E07DB49639EA5.quest_desc3: 通用机械内的大部分物品都要用它俩做。
quest.3E7E07DB49639EA5.title: &c红石&r&a灌注&r
quest.3E92AE1CCA722AA3.quest_desc1: Chances are, you've seen this squirrel-like creature running around in the world. If you want to befriend the &aStarbuncle&r, hold a &6Gold Nugget&r in your hand and toss it to one, which will give you the &aStarbuncle Charm&r.
quest.3E92AE1CCA722AA3.quest_desc3: Starbunkles are used to pick up items off the ground and transport them to storage nearby. Using the Dominion Wand, you can bind a Starbuncle to a specific chest for it to transport items to. If you'd like them to transfer items out of a chest, you must first select the chest with the Wand, then use it again on the Starbuncle.
quest.3E92AE1CCA722AA3.quest_desc5: To reset the Starbuncle, just sneak-use the Wand on the Starbuncle to clear instructions.
quest.3E92AE1CCA722AA3.title: &dMagical &fSquirrels
quest.3F18A0C9F246235B.quest_desc1: &2Wilden&r are magical creatures found in the overworld within &2Wilden Dens&r. However, these can be difficult to find at times.
quest.3F18A0C9F246235B.quest_desc3: Instead, you can summon the different types by using a &6Summon Wilden Ritual&r. This can be used to get your first Wilden Drops, which are needed for several recipes, including upgrading to a &6Tier 3 Spell Book&r.
quest.3F18A0C9F246235B.title: &fTablet of Summon Wilden
quest.3F4C25DF20877606.quest_desc1: &aEthanol&r is a very useful resource that can be turned into &2Herbicide&r, &2Biodiesel&r, and &dAcetaldehyde&r.
quest.3F4C25DF20877606.quest_desc3: We'll need &dAcetaldehyde&r to make a type of plastic sheet for electronic components.
quest.3F4C25DF20877606.title: &fEthanol
quest.3F81397C7818B7C5.quest_desc1: &5Eclipse Ember&r is the final tier of coals produced by the mod.
quest.3F81397C7818B7C5.quest_desc3: One piece of this Ember is worth 3x as much as &dVoidflame Coal&r.
quest.3F81397C7818B7C5.title: &5Eclipse Ember
quest.3FB2A1A98B36234F.quest_desc1: The &5Trinity Gem&r is an upgraded version of the &cSoul Gem&r and is able to capture almost any mob.
quest.3FB2A1A98B36234F.title: &5Trinity Gem
quest.3FB51F0568B0896C.quest_desc1: With our newly created &bCompressed Iron&r, we can get started crafting the basic items in &6PneumaticCraft&r!
quest.3FB51F0568B0896C.quest_desc3: To start, we'll need to make some &aPressure Tubes&r, which are used to carry &bCompressed Air&r. These are similar to "cables" from other mods!
quest.3FB51F0568B0896C.quest_desc5: Fun Fact: If the pressure inside of the tubes reaches 5.0 BAR, it will explode!
quest.3FB51F0568B0896C.quest_desc7: &bAir Pressure&r also takes time to build up! It relies on a completely &bclosed system&r, meaning it will try to escape if there is a hole somewhere in the pipe network.
quest.3FB51F0568B0896C.quest_desc9: You'll know when there is a hole somewhere, as you'll hear the air rushing out. Right clicking with a &aPneumatic Wrench&r will close the open section!
quest.3FB51F0568B0896C.title: &fPushing Pressure
quest.3FB99C220188AB6F.quest_desc1: The &6Enchanter's Sword&r will cast a spell with the &2Touch&r as the default form, but also gains one additional Amplify augment on the last effect of the spell!
quest.3FB99C220188AB6F.quest_desc3: The &6Enchanter's Shield&r will grant the user Mana Regen and Spell Damage for a short duration when you block damage with it. It also repairs itself over time using your mana pool.
quest.3FB99C220188AB6F.title: &fEnchanter's Sword \&\ Shield
quest.3FC961B8C0657214.quest_desc1: &aCarbon Fibre Strands&r are sturdy enough to be used in machines and &bAddon&r recipes, and as crafting materials in other machines to craft more advanced components.
quest.3FC961B8C0657214.title: &3Carbon Fibre&r
quest.3FE99AE10B0737BB.title: &fStores A Lot of 1 Item Type
quest.4004CA1BEBA2914C.quest_desc1: &dVibrant Alloy&r is a high tier alloy and is used in several recipes, including the &aElectromagnet&r and the &dOctadic Capacitor&r.
quest.4004CA1BEBA2914C.title: &dVibrant Alloy
quest.400EFC233FBC8CBA.quest_desc1: The &aFlux Compressor&r is a machine that converts &cFE&r into &bAir Pressure&r!
quest.400EFC233FBC8CBA.title: &fFlux Compressor
quest.40255F6F1C60B588.title: &f流体接口
quest.40352D7AADCFF6BA.quest_desc1: Either I'm going to have the biggest arms in the universe..
quest.40352D7AADCFF6BA.quest_desc3: Or I need to find a way to automate hammering.
quest.40352D7AADCFF6BA.quest_desc7: Note: This machine will automatically pull and push to storage on its sides. Blue will input, red will output.
quest.407FF5EFBC975E7C.quest_desc1: In the Lava Dimension, &cNetherrack&r seems to be a scarcity.
quest.407FF5EFBC975E7C.quest_desc3: I can find a few blocks scattered on the islands, but I need to find a way to make it.
quest.407FF5EFBC975E7C.quest_desc5: I think I should experiment more with the temperature of the &bSoul Fire&r.
quest.407FF5EFBC975E7C.quest_desc7: When heating up the &aTempered Glass Jar&r, it should replicate the heat of the Lava Dimension.
quest.407FF5EFBC975E7C.title: A Fleshy Stone
quest.408165388CBC4556.title: &f化学品导管
quest.40836F3C75BD93D1.quest_desc1: &dRefined Obsidian Dust&r is used for more than just turning into &dEnriched Obsidian&r!
quest.40836F3C75BD93D1.quest_desc3: To create &dRefined Ingots&r, we'll need to make an &aOsmium Compressor&r first. This machine needs &aOsmium&r placed into the bottom slot to function.
quest.40836F3C75BD93D1.quest_desc5: With the Osmium Compressor, you can create &dRefined Obsidian Ingots&r and &6Refined Glowstone Ingots&r. Both of these are used in high-end crafts, as well as being great materials for making tools with!
quest.40836F3C75BD93D1.title: &dRefined Ingots
quest.40AD268694D57BD9.quest_desc1: The &dMycelial Sourcelink&r generates a moderate amount of source from nearby food, with a bonus depending on the overal nourishment of the food, with &9Source Berry&r food generating more than other non-magical foods.
quest.40AD268694D57BD9.quest_desc3: This Sourcelink will also convert Grass or Dirt in the 3x3 below it into Mycelium, and will grow mushrooms around it if the space is empty.
quest.40AD268694D57BD9.quest_desc5: You can "feed" it items by using nearby pedestals.
quest.40AD268694D57BD9.title: &dMycelial Sourcelink
quest.40B00524384110B9.quest_desc1: The &aVortex Tube&r uses compressed air to make one side &bCold&r and the other side &cHot&r.
quest.40B00524384110B9.quest_desc3: The higher the airflow, the more extreme the temperature difference will be.
quest.40B00524384110B9.title: &fVortex Tube
quest.40C04194E9876363.title: Discoverer of Poseidon's Secret
quest.41114A3FA46FF7D9.quest_desc3: Before I let it consume me, I want to try out some more experiments on how it behaves with fluids.
quest.41114A3FA46FF7D9.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Craft &cPolymorphic Catalysts&r and drop them in water to create &bPolymorphic Fluid&r.
quest.41114A3FA46FF7D9.title: It's Morphin Time
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc1: Our new friend should make it easy for us to make &eCrushed Endstone&r, but before we continue, it's important to understand more about &bRituals&r and &bPentacles&r!
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc11: ["", {"text": "Rituals", "color": "#55FFFF"}, " are mainly split into four categories: ", {"text": "Binding", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": {"action": "change_page", "value": "51D07B8762C46982"}}, ", ", {"text": "Possession", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": { "action": "change_page", "value": "0EBEF0B2D2F13C3D"}}, ", ", {"text": "Familiar", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": { "action": "change_page", "value": "6338A56F731A5F25"}}, ", and ", {"text": "Summoning", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": { "action": "change_page", "value": "6137DE875E13EF72"}}, "."]
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc13: Your &aAviar's Circle&r &bPentacle&r is considered a &aSummoning Pentacle&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc15: The next upgrade for it is &cOphyx's Calling&r, which allows you to summon &cDjinni&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc17: When completing a &bRitual&r, a purple particle effect will show that the &bRitual&r is successful and in progress.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc19: If a &bRitual&r shows gray particles above the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r, then additional requirements need to be fulfilled, such as item use or a &cliving sacrifice&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc3: In short, a &bPentacle&r is a formation of glyphs, bowls, and stabilizers placed around the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc5: A &bRitual&r is the act of offering items to summon a &bSpirit&r from &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc7: There are 4 different types of &bPentacles&r, and each can be upgraded as you progress.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc9: This means that you only need four 19x19 areas to set up all 4 types of &bPentacles&r!
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.title: &fMore About &bRituals \&\ Pentacles
quest.4126A470077923D2.quest_desc1: &a纸箱&r非常有用，它可以移动方块，比如箱子、刷怪笼和别的方块！
quest.4126A470077923D2.quest_desc3: 第一次对方块使用箱子会给它打包，这样你就可以把它当一个物品打掉。放下物品再潜行右击，箱子就会被移除。
quest.4126A470077923D2.title: &f移动实体方块的办法
quest.416864E64F21CC47.quest_desc1: There is not a single water bottle in this vast ocean. Kuddos for keeping it clean, but I need some form of plastic soon.
quest.416864E64F21CC47.quest_desc3: Using the &6Centrifuge&r, I should be able to extract &2Biopolymers&r from something organic.
quest.416864E64F21CC47.quest_desc5: With enough Biopolymers, I should be able to make a natural type of plastic!
quest.416864E64F21CC47.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Use the &6Centrifuge&r with the Machine Fluid Addon to process &aPacked Wheat&r into &2Biopolymers&r. Run this through again to create &bPlastic Sheets&r.
quest.416864E64F21CC47.title: Plastic!
quest.417573A657CAED05.quest_desc1: Once you've gathered some materials from the &cNether&r, you can upgrade to the next tier of Goo.
quest.417573A657CAED05.quest_desc3: &cBlazebloom Goo&r will allow you to create a new tier of metal call &6Blazegold&r by converting &eBlocks of Gold&r, just like we did with Iron.
quest.417573A657CAED05.quest_desc5: To activate it, you'll need to feed it either Nether Wart or Blaze Powder.
quest.417573A657CAED05.quest_desc7: It also retains the ability to create &aFerricore Ore&r, so no need to make another Primogel Goo just for Iron. Not only that, it converts Iron faster than Primogel!
quest.417573A657CAED05.title: &fCreating &cBlazegold
quest.41C7ED53AA36D647.quest_desc1: &cDjinnis&r can be used to fastforward time to &aDawn&r or &aDusk&r, depending on your needs.
quest.41C7ED53AA36D647.quest_desc3: &eTime Spirits&r will modify time once before vanishing.
quest.41C7ED53AA36D647.title: &cDjinni Time Mage
quest.41DC64EC52AB0494.quest_desc1: You can also crystalize entire blocks at once by dropping or placing them down in front of, or next to, the &aAtomic Reconstructor's&r laser beam.
quest.41DC64EC52AB0494.title: &fCrystal Blocks
quest.41E945A91F63D888.quest_desc1: You have two options for making magical belts, both of which are pretty cool.
quest.41E945A91F63D888.quest_desc3: - The &bBelt of Levitation&r allows the wearer to levitate a moderate distance above the ground. To activate it, sneak in the air while falling or jumping to start floating! It also reduces a small amount of fall damage when worn.
quest.41E945A91F63D888.quest_desc5: - The &bBelt of Unstable Gifts&r will occasionally grant a random positive potion effect for a short duration. It's like magical gambling, but on a belt.
quest.41E945A91F63D888.title: &dMagical &fBelts!
quest.425CB9CE53FBC0FF.quest_desc1: By default, the &6Enchanter's Mirror&r will cast a spell with the form &aSelf&r.
quest.425CB9CE53FBC0FF.quest_desc3: You could use this to create a Mirror that heals you by inscribing a spell that just contains &2Heal&r onto the mirror!
quest.425CB9CE53FBC0FF.title: &fEnchanter's Mirror
quest.42965470631D920F.quest_desc1: I’ve gathered materials that react to the portal’s energy.
quest.42965470631D920F.quest_desc2: Not sure if I’m on the verge of a breakthrough or just one bad decision away from becoming deep-sea dust, but here we are.
quest.42965470631D920F.quest_desc5: If I can stabilize it, I can open it. If I can open it, I can see what’s on the other side.
quest.42965470631D920F.quest_desc7: It’s a huge gamble. But at this point, calculated risk is just a fancy term for "Tuesday."
quest.42965470631D920F.title: Log Entry 012
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc1: For our first &bRitual&r, we're going to summon a &7Foliot Crusher&r using the &bAviar's Circle Pentacle&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc11: Next, you'll place down the items needed in the &aSacrificial Bowls&r, then place in the &aBook of Binding: Foliot (Bound)&r into the center &6Golden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc13: Once all items are in place, you can right click the Golden Sacrificial Bowl and start the ritual!
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc15: The items inside the bowls will be consumed until there are none left, at which point the &7Foliot Crusher&r will appear next to the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc17: Like all other &bCrushers&r, the &7Foliot Crusher&r will grind down items into dust, providing 2x the output.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc19: The Crusher is also needed to create the next color of Chalk we'll need!
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc3: The easiest way to do this is to navigate to the &bPentacles&r tab in your guidebook, then find &bAviar's Circle&r. On the right side, you should see a render of it with an &beye icon&r in the bottom right.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc5: Clicking this will allow you to place a &bhologram&r to help you create the pentacle!
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc7: Once you've drawn and completed the layout of the &bPentacle&r, you can place down 4 &aSacrificial Bowls&r anywhere within 8 blocks of the &2Golden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc9: You might notice that most &bPentacles&r have the perfect spot for these!
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.title: &fYour First Ritual
quest.42E45B47360C59F3.quest_desc1: &2Essence Farmland&r can be created by using any tier of Inferium Essence on a piece of Farmland. These can also be crafted.
quest.42E45B47360C59F3.quest_desc3: These types of farmland increase the output of &aInferium Essence&r when harvested. Higher tier farmlands only increase the amount of Inferium Essence when harvested.
quest.42E45B47360C59F3.title: &bUnderstanding &2Essence Farmland
quest.432185176A39B3B2.title: &fMoonstone
quest.433585FE9BD5DF62.quest_desc1: What's that saying? What doesn't kill you makes you stronger?
quest.433585FE9BD5DF62.quest_desc3: That seems to be the case for the &bCompressed Iron&r I've made. It seems very durable!
quest.433585FE9BD5DF62.quest_desc5: It's probably a good idea to construct some sort of gear out of this.
quest.4348C9D795E92FCE.quest_desc1: This &aPortable Energy Storage&r can hold up to 1M RF and will retain energy when broken.
quest.4348C9D795E92FCE.quest_desc3: The &aPortable Energy Storage&r accepts energy from all sides through a green port and can only output through the single red port. A redstone signal will disable all energy output.
quest.4348C9D795E92FCE.title: &aPortable Energy Storage&r
quest.4348D85E3DB176E2.quest_desc1: 如果想要你的路由器能运输能量，你就需要加装一个&a能量升级&r。
quest.4348D85E3DB176E2.quest_desc3: 每个升级都可以提升路由器的&b总能量缓存&r，以及单次运输的&b能量传输量&r。这个升级最高堆叠为64一组。
quest.4348D85E3DB176E2.quest_desc5: 如果想要把能量输出，你就需要安装一个&a能量输出模块&r。拿着这个模块，然后对着路由器上你想输出能量的一点使用即可。
quest.4348D85E3DB176E2.quest_desc7: 如果想要无线传输能源的话，请使用&6能量分配模块&r。对着方块潜行右击就可以把它加入传输能量的方块列表，无线传输范围在模块化路由器的周围一圈。
quest.4348D85E3DB176E2.quest_desc9: 你可以对着模块使用&a范围拓展&r来提升无线范围。
quest.4348D85E3DB176E2.title: &f掌！控！抛！瓦！
quest.436BFB9B69B6D4A7.quest_desc1: The &aSqueezer&r presses &2Plant Oil&r out of seeds, or 8 &3Coke Dusts&r into &cHOP Graphite Dust&r.
quest.436BFB9B69B6D4A7.quest_desc3: Make sure to check out the &bEngineer's Manual&r to help you build the multiblock!
quest.436BFB9B69B6D4A7.title: &fIndustrial Squeezer
quest.437F2C378CD6FE51.quest_desc1: &a灌注机&r可以用&a碳&r把铁变为&2钢&r！
quest.437F2C378CD6FE51.quest_desc3: 你可以把煤炭或木炭放入灌注槽内，将其转化为碳，木炭可以转化为两倍的碳。等机器里有两倍的碳后，就把铁丢进去处理，得到&a富集铁&r。把它再用碳灌注一次就能得到&2钢粉&r，之后直接熔炼就是&2钢锭&r了！
quest.437F2C378CD6FE51.quest_desc5: &2钢&r的耐久很高，作为工具来说再好不过了，而且制作这个模组的基础管道也需要用钢。
quest.437F2C378CD6FE51.title: &c碳&r&a灌注&r
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.quest_desc1: &6多方块合成CPU&r是AE2的自动合成核心。
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.quest_desc11: 我打个比方吧，1000个合成台首先需要把木头变成模板，模板再做成合成桌。如果你安装了多个并行处理单元的话，你的多方块合成器就可以同时处理木头变木板，还有木板变合成桌。不然的话它就会先完成木头合成模板，再一次性把模板变成合成桌。
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.quest_desc13: 有一个非常重要的事：一个&6多方块合成CPU&r一次只能处理一种合成任务，如果你想合成1000个合成台的同时烧1000个铁锭，那你就需要两个合成CPU才能处理两个任务。
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.quest_desc3: 这个多方块必须按照六边形的规模搭建，不允许有任何空缺方块，其中至少要有一个&a合成存储器&r。&a并行处理单元&r也推荐放几个进去。
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.quest_desc5: &a合成存储器&r是用来存储合成原材料的，存储值代表一次请求可以合成的物品量。
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.quest_desc7: 比如，如果你想做1000个合成台，那你就需要足够的空间，至少能装下1000个合成台的全部原材料。
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.quest_desc9: &并行处理单元&r是个可选组件，不过我推荐你还是放几个比较好。并行处理单元越多，意味着一次可以执行的分支请求就越多，对于那种合成树很复杂的请求很有效。
quest.43949500F6A0B46A.title: &f多方块自动合成&6
quest.43B4B6F09B5AF30C.quest_desc1: The &bDominion Wand&r is the wrench of Ars Nouveau, and has several important uses!
quest.43B4B6F09B5AF30C.quest_desc3: First, this wand can be used to configure the transfer of &dSource&r between blocks. For example, you can use this to direct the flow of Source from a &aSource Relay&r into a specific &bSource Jar&r. Just use the wand on the block you'd like to take Source from, then use it again on the block you'd like to transfer it to.
quest.43B4B6F09B5AF30C.quest_desc5: You can clear the selection by sneak-using the wand. Sneak-using the wand in the air willd switch it to Strict mode, allowing you to specify the exact side you want to use.
quest.43B4B6F09B5AF30C.quest_desc7: This is also used to help control Familiars!
quest.43B4B6F09B5AF30C.title: &aMore Control
quest.43BF1E0CE33F8BB7.quest_desc1: If we want to commune with the &5Eldritch Gods&r, we need the right colors of &bChalk&r.
quest.43BF1E0CE33F8BB7.quest_desc3: ["Using ", {"text": "Xeovrenth Adjure", "color": "#FFAA00"}, ", ", {"text": "Cruelty Essence", "color": "#FF5555"}, " can be used to craft ", {"text": "Brown Chalk", "color": "#AA7B5A"}, "."]
quest.43BF1E0CE33F8BB7.title: {"text": "Brown Chalk", "color": "#AA7B5A"}
quest.43C1ECB8F2112CDF.quest_desc1: I have started my search for a crystal capable of harnessing a steady flow of power into it.
quest.43C1ECB8F2112CDF.quest_desc3: These crystals will allow me to create some advanced technology I'll need to get off of this planet...
quest.43C1ECB8F2112CDF.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Locate a &6Budding Amethyst&r and acquire &dAmethyst Shards&r.
quest.43C1ECB8F2112CDF.quest_desc9: - Using 2 of &6Just Dires&r &aSimple Swappers&r to swap them to your base.
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.quest_desc1: Although there's a pre-programmed &5Harvesting Drone&r, this questline is going to teach you how to make one yourself. This should give you a good headstart on how programming works!
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.quest_desc13: You might also notice that when you add commands to harvest and/or import something from a chest, an &aArea Block&r is needed. To easily add the correct coordinates, simply left click with your GPS Tool to paste them in.
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.quest_desc15: You can also add &aFilter Blocks&r to certain commands, in this given code, you may want to set one for the Hoe you wish to use.
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.quest_desc20: &eBonus tip:&r It's good practice to add a &9Standby&r command at the end so your drone can shut itself off when no work is needed, saving some &bPressure&r
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.quest_desc3: To get started, open up your &aProgramming Table&r and import the code:
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.quest_desc5: Look for the "Import Button" at the top left of the GUI, then click the "paste from clipboard" option in the bottom.
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.quest_desc9: With this you can notice that &bDrone Code&r is done via &3Code Blocks/Steps&r you can start by placing the &a"Start Block"&r and then add a block for each respective step of the process.
quest.43E68DE2E5A53162.title: &fHarvesting Crops with &dDrones
quest.443C71D871AFAB67.quest_desc1: &a麻袋&r不仅可以像背包一样存放物品，还可以自动捡起地上的某样物品。
quest.443C71D871AFAB67.quest_desc3: &a虚空麻袋&r和普通麻袋功能一样，但是你关闭界面后里头的东西就会被直接销毁。
quest.443C71D871AFAB67.title: &f麻袋
quest.44882A0B7C12B3F6.title: &cBlazegold Bow
quest.44E044BA9C152631.quest_desc1: In some quests, you'll notice tasks that have &aoptional&r attached to them.
quest.44E044BA9C152631.quest_desc3: Most of the time, this is done so you can click them to see the recipe for certain rituals!
quest.44E044BA9C152631.quest_desc5: Keep an eye out for what is required as lots of quests have optional tasks to complete.
quest.44E044BA9C152631.title: &fA Note For The Questline
quest.44FE5A6E3A857A01.quest_desc1: The &aPipe Booster&r will increase a pipe's throughput when given power and attached to a pipe network.
quest.450A1BAD728F594B.quest_desc1: 等你成功连通了两个&d量子桥&r后，就可以合成并链接&6量子桥卡&r，然后把它装入你的无线终端里头！这张卡可以让你无视维度限制访问AE网络。
quest.450A1BAD728F594B.quest_desc3: 如果想把终端和网络链接在一起的话，首先做一对&d量子纠缠奇点&r，然后一个放在接入基地的&6量子桥&r内，另一个和量子桥卡一起装入你的&d无线终端&r即可。
quest.450A1BAD728F594B.title: &d无限距离无线访问
quest.452A356F35EE46DD.quest_desc1: &aEmpowered Diamantine Crystals&r are used in advanced &6Actually Additions&r recipes.
quest.452A356F35EE46DD.title: &fEmpowered Diamantine Crystal
quest.454B2187BD8B939F.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fArmor
quest.45621893734C0B96.quest_desc1: &5Magentite&r is produced as a waste product when &9Blutonium&r is used as fuel inside a standard &dReactor&r.
quest.45621893734C0B96.title: &5Magentite
quest.458B3C345767E296.title: &5Nether Star Seeds
quest.45C2A0B3F277C09B.quest_desc1: &e高玩提示&r：你可以直接对着任意通用机械的管线使用&c合金&r，这会直接把它们升到下一级！
quest.45C2A0B3F277C09B.title: {"text": "基础通用线缆", "color": "#5EFCB6"}
quest.45CB3F325010A5AD.quest_desc1: The &6Experience Holder&r is one of the most advanced experience collectors you can make.
quest.45CB3F325010A5AD.quest_desc3: It works similar to an Item Collector, and has a configurable range to collect experience from around it.
quest.45CB3F325010A5AD.quest_desc5: It also works as a fluid tank for experience, and allows you to insert or retrieve levels from the interface!
quest.45CB3F325010A5AD.title: &fExperience Holder
quest.45D6FDAD1A1AB002.quest_desc1: The &aRotary Condensentrator&r (say that 10 times fast) turns gases into liquids, or vice versa.
quest.45D6FDAD1A1AB002.quest_desc3: You'll use this machine in several parts of your factories, but for now, we're going to use it to make &bWater Vapor&r from Water.
quest.45D6FDAD1A1AB002.quest_desc5: Pump in some water and change the operation mode with the button in the top right to switch between the modes to turn the liquid into gas. That should give you &bWater Vapor&r!
quest.45D6FDAD1A1AB002.title: &aSpinny Machine
quest.45E7D62C229F898C.quest_desc1: 你可以用&6合成终端&r合成物品，但它能同时访问全部存储的物品，为你实现集成式合成！
quest.45E7D62C229F898C.quest_desc3: 合成终端和别的面板式方块一样，无法连接到致密线缆上。但是玻璃线缆、包层线缆和智能线缆可以！
quest.45E7D62C229F898C.quest_desc5: &6存储总线&r可以把连接的所有的存储方块并入AE网络。
quest.45E7D62C229F898C.title: &fME合成终端
quest.45F8CB4497591B10.title: &cTier 3 &fMob Seeds
quest.46169983AA03D507.quest_desc1: Kill the &dRift Weaver&r in the Rift.
quest.46169983AA03D507.title: The Rift Weaver
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc1: Have you ever gone caving and stumbled onto a random fully grown tree? That's most likely an &2Otherworld Grove&r.
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc3: &2Otherworld Groves&r are overgrown caves filled with &aOtherworld Trees&r and walls of made of &3Otherstone&r.
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc5: &aOtherworld Trees&r appear as oak trees to the naked eye, but reveal their true form under the &bThird Eye&r effect.
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc7: &2Otherworld Saplings&r can only be obtained by breaking &aOtherworld Leaves&r manually.
quest.465A950126ABF758.title: &aOtherworld Groves
quest.46617B1FA6A39399.quest_desc1: Although it's made from literal fire, &cPolymorphic Fluid&r can change its composition depending on the item it consumes.
quest.46617B1FA6A39399.quest_desc3: What can I use it to create?
quest.46617B1FA6A39399.title: Let It... Snow?
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc1: 构建属于你的&bAE网络&r前，首先了解一下有关&6频道&r的知识吧。你不用担心频道用得抠抠搜搜，因为这个包的AE频道数量&b翻了四倍&r，对新手极其友好。
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc11: &b玻璃线缆&r可以传输能量，在该整合包设定下可以传递&b32个频道&r。
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc13: &6智能线缆&r传递频道数和玻璃线缆一样，但是它可视化了线缆的频道负载。
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc15: &a致密线缆&r可以传递&b128个频道&r，但不能连接总线和面板。如果你想的话可以制作智能致密线缆！
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc3: &6频道&r是你网络能同时处理的设备最大值，如果巧妙利用一些机制，或者加装多方块&aME控制器&r的话，就可以提升频道。后面的任务会介绍多方块控制器。
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc5: 这个包因为频道数翻了四倍，所以你的初始网络应该有&632个频道&r。
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc7: 你可以用三种不同的ME线缆连通你的网络，这三种线缆分别为&b玻璃线缆&r，&b致密线缆&r，以及&6智能线缆&r。
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.quest_desc9: 每个线缆所传递频道数都不同，意味着如果你线缆全都用ME玻璃线缆的话，大后期必然会出问题。
quest.46A1341E5E97ABDC.title: &b线缆&f和&6频道
quest.46AF8085E4151D9E.quest_desc1: The &cBedrock Extractor&r can mine ores from &aResource Nodes&r found are found.
quest.46AF8085E4151D9E.quest_desc3: This multiblock machine can only operate when placed directly above &aResource Nodes&r and must be powered using &aEnderic Lasers&r.
quest.46AF8085E4151D9E.quest_desc5: When right-clicked, it will show the targeted &aResource Nodes&r below. It will target the first visible ore node in a 3x3 area below, up to 3 blocks down.
quest.46AF8085E4151D9E.quest_desc7: When in operation, the &cBedrock Extractor&r mines ores directly below it, covering the entire 3x3 area. Each operation randomly selects one of the blocks below. Not all blocks need to be &aResources Nodes&r. Try to find a spot with the most ores right below the extractor for the highest yield.
quest.46AF8085E4151D9E.title: &cBedrock Extractor
quest.46BB702F2847F818.quest_desc1: By throwing redstone dust into the laser, you can get &aRestonia Crystals&r, which is used in most &6Actually Additions&r recipes.
quest.46BB702F2847F818.title: &fRestonia Crystal
quest.46C2C45AE017AE81.quest_desc1: When equipped to a &aJust Dire's Pickaxe&r, right clicking will activate the ability and make nearby ores glow through walls.
quest.46C2C45AE017AE81.title: &fUpgrade: Ore Scanner
quest.471F26D3F526F785.quest_desc1: Even after defeating the &dRift Weaver&r, it still seems his dark influence controls this portal.
quest.471F26D3F526F785.quest_desc3: The &6Pedestals&r all around the Portal Frames might just be the clue on how to break free of his hold.
quest.471F26D3F526F785.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Gather the &612 Trophies of Oceanblock&r and place each one on a pedestal around the portal frames.
quest.471F26D3F526F785.quest_desc7: Once all 12 are placed, activating the portal frame will open a portal back home.
quest.471F26D3F526F785.title: A Way Back Home
quest.4782346A565FF21F.quest_desc1: The &aSAG Mill&r crushes items into dusts, and can be used to increase ore yields.
quest.4782346A565FF21F.quest_desc3: &bGrinding Balls&r can be used to improve machine power usage, and item process output. There are many tiers of Grinding Balls, but you can always use &3Flint&r when just starting out.
quest.47916D9BDCC5E6C4.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fGear
quest.479955FA73CB4C7D.quest_desc1: With access to &dAtomic Alloys&r, we can create &dTeleportation Cores&r!
quest.479955FA73CB4C7D.quest_desc3: This allows us to create items and machines that allow for wireless transmitting of pretty much everything, including creating portals!
quest.479955FA73CB4C7D.title: &bTeleportation Cores
quest.47AD944D7AEC4919.quest_desc1: With access to &aEnderic Compounds&r, you can now craft &cAdvanced Machine Cores&r (Tier 4).
quest.47AD944D7AEC4919.title: Tier 4 Machine Cores
quest.47EAA97131FD2B76.quest_desc1: &a生长指环&r在充能的时候，会自动催生玩家周边三格内的作物。
quest.47EAA97131FD2B76.title: &f生长指环
quest.4843F5564CA5810C.quest_desc1: The &aDiesel Generator&r generates &dHV&r power by consuming fuels like &2Diesel&r.
quest.4843F5564CA5810C.quest_desc3: Depending on the fuel used, certain fuels will burn for longer inside the generator, creating more power.
quest.4843F5564CA5810C.quest_desc5: For a full list of fuels check the &bEngineer's Manual&r or JEI.
quest.4843F5564CA5810C.quest_desc7: To learn more about building and using them, refer to the &aElectrical Grids&r section of the &bEngineer's Manual&r.
quest.4843F5564CA5810C.title: &fDiesel Generator
quest.48567556D94D1ADC.title: &cBlazegold Axe
quest.487A0367385B68BC.quest_desc1: &6Grains of the End&r shows your mastery of EnderIO.
quest.487A0367385B68BC.title: &6Grains of the End
quest.4887C8EA4441F62B.quest_desc1: The &cFuel Generator&r is a 3x3x2 multiblock generator that consumes &3Crude Oil&r or &cTurbofuel&r to generate power.
quest.4887C8EA4441F62B.quest_desc3: &cTurbofuel&r provides the same RF/t, but lasts a lot longer!
quest.4887C8EA4441F62B.title: &fThe &cFuel Generator&r
quest.48935669BAAC9142.quest_desc1: &aEnderic Lenses&r are used as crafting components for &bAddons&r and machines!
quest.48A82982DE38D228.quest_desc1: &dEcho Shards&r are exactly what I needed.
quest.48A82982DE38D228.quest_desc3: These crystal shards can easily handle any amount of power thrown into it.
quest.48A82982DE38D228.quest_desc5: Now I can use this crystal to create a machine that focuses power into a single point, creating a &6Laser&r!
quest.48A82982DE38D228.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Using &dEcho Shards&r and &dEnderic Compounds&r, craft an &dEnderic Laser&r using the &6Assembler&r.
quest.48A82982DE38D228.title: Laser Focus
quest.48CADAFA7696B518.quest_desc1: Going deeper beneath the Ruins structure, you'll find a massive &bCrystal&r.
quest.48CADAFA7696B518.quest_desc3: This structure has several loot barrels to scavenge through, some with some important items needed for progression.
quest.48CADAFA7696B518.quest_desc5: Using the &aCrowbar&r, you can crack open any crate that isn't rusted shut.
quest.48CADAFA7696B518.title: &fFinding a &9Crystal Geode
quest.4929927157D97BFC.quest_desc1: The &aImproved Gemset Ring&r has a x1.5 base effect multiplier, which stacks with the &aBanding Material&r quality.
quest.4929927157D97BFC.title: &fImproved Gemset Ring
quest.4962BB8B57D6650E.quest_desc1: In this mod, there are several types of &aFluids&r you can create. Some are just simple fuels used to create more power, while others are used to bind time and space.
quest.4962BB8B57D6650E.quest_desc3: To create these fluids, you'll need to start by making &cPolymorphic Catalysts&r from Blazegold.
quest.4962BB8B57D6650E.quest_desc5: Drop one of these into water to convert it to &6Polymorphic Fluid&r.
quest.4962BB8B57D6650E.title: &fCreating &cFluids
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc1: &6Iron's Jems \&\ Jewelry&r is a mod that focus on combining materials and &bJewels&r to provide the player with special effects or stat increases.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc10: &e&lNOTE&r: This questline only covers some of the basic use-cases for items. There are over two-thousand possible combinations, so it is advisable that you test things out and experiment to see what you like best.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc3: You will need to craft a &aJewelcrafting Station&r to begin making some basic &bJewelry&r.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc5: To learn more advanced &bJewelry&r, you will need to find their blueprints by exploring the world.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc7: Most &bJewelry&r consists of a &aBand Material&r and a &aGem&r.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.title: &fWelcome to &6Iron's Gems \&\ Jewelry&f!
quest.4978D64CC0840556.quest_desc1: 有时你可能存储需求 极 其 巨 大 ，&6MEGA&r模组这时就派上用场了。
quest.4978D64CC0840556.quest_desc3: 你需要制造一些&a陨铁&r，才能合成该模组的存储元件。
quest.4978D64CC0840556.quest_desc5: 哦，你还需要一种新的压印模板，用&d奇点&r就能制造。
quest.4978D64CC0840556.title: &aMEGA&r存储元件
quest.49835EC10C5AE8D8.quest_desc1: &6量子合成器&r是分子装配室、样板供应器和ME请求器的三合一设备。
quest.49835EC10C5AE8D8.quest_desc3: 而且这玩意制造速度超级快，设置好了的话可以用来维持多个物品的库存，如果嫌慢可以用加速卡升级。
quest.49835EC10C5AE8D8.quest_desc5: 唯一问题就是它里头只能放9个模板。
quest.49835EC10C5AE8D8.title: &f量子合成器
quest.498FEAF2BFD77D2E.quest_desc1: The &aGarden Cloche&r is a very sought-after machine that grows crops and automatically harvests and replants them in a controlled environment.
quest.498FEAF2BFD77D2E.quest_desc3: Seeds require the correct soil to grow, and providing fertilizers will boost growth speed.
quest.498FEAF2BFD77D2E.quest_desc5: The machines require water and power to function.
quest.498FEAF2BFD77D2E.title: &fGarden Cloche
quest.49C272F5ECDF9FA4.quest_desc1: To craft an &aInsanite Ingot&r, insert sixteen &bBenitoite&r and two buckets of &bLiquid &cRossinite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.49C272F5ECDF9FA4.quest_desc3: &aInsanite&r has the best performance out of all other blocks when used within your &dReactors&r or as &3Turbine Coils&r.
quest.49C272F5ECDF9FA4.title: &aInsanite
quest.49D399724FD1805B.quest_desc1: &cTurbofuel&r is a more efficient fuel that can be used to create power or fuel &aOritech Jetpacks&r!
quest.49D399724FD1805B.quest_desc3: To create &cTurbofuel&r, you'll need to process &aCrude Oil&r and &dFluxite&r in a &aCentrifuge&r with the &bFluid Addon&r installed.
quest.49D399724FD1805B.title: &cTurbofuel
quest.49DD167D6323406B.quest_desc1: Functional Storage can also handle storing fluids using &aFluid Drawers&r!
quest.49DD167D6323406B.quest_desc3: You can pump in fluids directly into the drawer to set it, or just by using a bucket of the fluid onto the drawer.
quest.49DD167D6323406B.title: &fFluid Drawers
quest.49E9EBFC7B717D8E.quest_desc1: &0Crude Oil&r is extremely valuable because it can be refined into some very useful liquids, most importantly &dGasoline&r and eventually &bPlastic&r!
quest.49E9EBFC7B717D8E.quest_desc3: To do this, you'll need to set up a &aRefinery&r. This is a small multiblock structure made up of the &aRefinery Controller&r and multiple &2Refinery Outputs&r.
quest.49E9EBFC7B717D8E.quest_desc5: The &aRefinery Controller&r will need to be heated up, and the outputs determine how many different byproducts you can create when refining.
quest.49E9EBFC7B717D8E.quest_desc7: This can easily be done by placing the &aRefinery Controller&r directly over a lava source block, and then stacking the 4 outputs on top of it.
quest.49E9EBFC7B717D8E.quest_desc9: You'll need to prevent &cHeat&r from dissipating, which can be done by covering each face with &bThermal Lagging&r.
quest.49E9EBFC7B717D8E.title: &fRefined Oil
quest.4A207BA624849BB8.quest_desc1: Just like Ender Chests, &dEnder Drawers&r will store items that can be accessed across dimensions.
quest.4A207BA624849BB8.quest_desc3: To do this, you'll need 2 Ender Drawers linked together using the Linking Tool. On the first Ender Drawer, left click the Linking Tool onto the top of the Ender Drawer to grab the frequency of the drawer.
quest.4A207BA624849BB8.quest_desc5: Next, place down another Ender Drawer where you'd like to use it, and then sneak-use the Linking Tool to set the frequency of the drawer.
quest.4A207BA624849BB8.title: &dEnder Drawers
quest.4A41B30728ED1307.quest_desc1: The &2Chemical Oxidizer&r breaks down items into gases.
quest.4A41B30728ED1307.quest_desc3: If you plan on upgrading your Ore Processing, you'll need to make this to break down &cSulfur Dust&r into a gas we can use, &aSulfur Dioxide&r.
quest.4A41B30728ED1307.quest_desc5: If we combine this with &bOxygen&r in a Chemical Infuser, it will give us &eSulfur Trioxide&r.
quest.4A41B30728ED1307.title: &2Chemical Oxidizer
quest.4A63B415FED7E777.quest_desc1: &6Uphyxes Inverted Tower&r combines the powers of &9Blue Chalk&r and &dWither Skeleton Skulls&r, allowing you to summon and bind &6Marids&r into extremely powerful items.
quest.4A63B415FED7E777.quest_desc3: Some &eBinding Rituals&r are optional, but you will need most of them if you want to reach &6Occultism&r end-game.
quest.4A63B415FED7E777.title: &6Uphyxes Inverted Tower
quest.4A707D443EC2DE33.quest_desc1: &6Functional Drawers&r is a storage mod that aims to provide an easy solution to storing tons of items in a single block!
quest.4A707D443EC2DE33.quest_desc3: Drawers come in several varieties: Single Drawers, 1x2 Drawers, and 2x2 Drawers. While a 2x2 drawer can store 4 separate items, the total base storage amount is also divided by 4.
quest.4A707D443EC2DE33.quest_desc5: To place an item in, simply right click on the drawer with the item. Double-right clicking will deposit multiple stacks at a time.
quest.4A707D443EC2DE33.quest_desc7: To remove items from a drawer, left clicking the drawer will remove 1 item at a time, while sneak-left clicking will pull a full stack at a time.
quest.4A707D443EC2DE33.title: &aFunctional Drawers
quest.4A8D12E484DF2A81.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fMachine Upgrade
quest.4B463FDAEAC42511.quest_desc1: &6物质聚合器&r会把输入的物品像垃圾桶一样销毁，但如果你给它插入一个64k存储元件的话，则它会把输入物品转化为&b物质球&r或&d奇点&r
quest.4B463FDAEAC42511.quest_desc3: &d奇点&r要用来制作大规模存储设备，以及跨维度链接装置。
quest.4B463FDAEAC42511.title: &f物质聚合器&6
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc1: The &6Rainbow Chalk&r can replace any non-foundation chalk (white, gray, light gray, black).
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc11: &5Void Chalk&r is an upgraded version of the &6Rainbow Chalk&r that can replace any chalk including foundation chalk.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc3: It also comes with extra features:
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc5: - Using a &aSpirit Attuned Gem&r in the off-hand toggles the random color changes, or use any dye to set the glyph color.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc7: - Using this chalk on a glyph while crouching will erase the glyph, acting as a &aChalk Brush&r.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc9: The &6Rainbow Chalk&r can also be used to make &5Void Chalk&r.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.title: &6Rainbow Chalk
quest.4B50B455573D924B.quest_desc1: Using &dAbras' Commanding Conjure&r you can summon &ePossessed Mobs&r that drop loot when killed.
quest.4B50B455573D924B.quest_desc3: &aElder Guardian&r: Nautilus Shells (2-4), Heart of the Sea (40%)
quest.4B50B455573D924B.quest_desc5: &aHoglin&r: Netherite Scrap, Music Discs/Fragments, Smithing Templates
quest.4B50B455573D924B.quest_desc9: &aWarden&r: Echo Shard (6+), with a chance for Music Discs/Fragments, and Smithing Templates
quest.4B50B455573D924B.title: &dAbras' Possessions
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.quest_desc1: Trader, time, and weather &bSpirits&r experience &eEssence Decay&r while outside &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.quest_desc3: Stronger &bSpirits&r can resist this decay, but only the strongest can fully overcome its effect. Once fully decayed, a &bSpirit&r will disappear and return to &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.quest_desc5: One can slow or even stop this decay by binding the &bSpirit&r to an object or living being. Additionally, the &bPentacle&r used can influence the effects of &eEssence Decay&r to some extent.
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.title: &eEssence Decay
quest.4BDC456540EBE648.quest_desc1: To craft &9Blutonium&r, insert two &bCyanite&r ingots and one bucket of water into a reprocessor.
quest.4BDC456540EBE648.title: &9Blutonium
quest.4C78823B3EFA3105.quest_desc1: The &dEnchanting Apparatus&r is basically the ritual table of Ars. It uses nearby items placed on &aArcane Pedestals&r to create new items, make enchantments, or upgrade Mage Armor later on.
quest.4C78823B3EFA3105.quest_desc3: To function, the Apparatus needs an &6Arcane Core&r placed underneath it. It also needs several &aArcane Pedestals&r placed within 3 blocks from the Apparatus. The number of pedestals needed depends on the recipe!
quest.4C78823B3EFA3105.quest_desc5: Some recipes also require &dSource&r, which means you'll need &aSource Jars&r placed within 3 blocks as well.
quest.4C78823B3EFA3105.title: &fThe &dEnchanting Apparatus
quest.4C9473D2E4149656.quest_desc1: &6Ronaza's Contact&r is the most complex and advanced &bPentacle&r, combining all human knowledge of &9The Otherworld&r to allow communication with the &5Eldritch Gods&r.
quest.4C9473D2E4149656.quest_desc3: Using this &bPentacle&r, you can craft the strongest items in &6Occultism&r.
quest.4C9473D2E4149656.title: &6Ronaza's Contact
quest.4CB308D92C354EC2.quest_desc1: No matter how much I search for the source of the dark energy, I've come up short.
quest.4CB308D92C354EC2.quest_desc3: There seems to be a &eglowing pool&r of some sorts at the back of this structure.
quest.4CB308D92C354EC2.quest_desc5: If this entity doesn't want to show itself, I'll make it come out.
quest.4CB308D92C354EC2.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Craft the &dHeart of the Rift&r and use it in the glowing pool inside of the &dRift&r.
quest.4CD72CD5BEF64E24.quest_desc3: I was not prepared for the damage that it caused. I tried to control it, but my ship spiraled into chaos...
quest.4CD72CD5BEF64E24.quest_desc5: &6&o&nTASK&r: Enter the &6Lobby Portal&r and choose your &bStarter Base&r.
quest.4CD72CD5BEF64E24.title: The Crash
quest.4CDCFE544B72E6C4.quest_desc1: The &5Eldritch Ancient Miner&r harvests entire blocks of raw ore at once.
quest.4CDCFE544B72E6C4.quest_desc3: Compressing the &6Master Marid Miner&r has given you an extremely powerul and efficient miner.
quest.4CDCFE544B72E6C4.title: &5Eldritch Ancient Miner
quest.4D21DB3EC7424E9A.title: &f能量卡
quest.4D5D4F2002B33DB6.quest_desc1: The &aChemical Infuser&r combines two gases into a new gas.
quest.4D5D4F2002B33DB6.quest_desc3: It has several important uses, but for now, we'll can use one to make Hydrogen Chloride for a better Ore Processing Chain.
quest.4D5D4F2002B33DB6.quest_desc5: To make &aHydrogen Chloride&r, we'll first need to take the liquid Brine our Tower is making and separate it out using an &eElectrolytic Separator&r. This will break it into &aSodium&r and &bChlorine&r.
quest.4D5D4F2002B33DB6.quest_desc7: You can then combine the &bChlorine&r with &bHydrogen&r in a &aChemical Infuser&r to get &aHydrogen Chloride&r.
quest.4D5D4F2002B33DB6.title: &fThe &aChemical Infuser
quest.4D6C3ED87414B7D1.quest_desc1: The &aFerricore Bow&r is a nice upgrade for those going for a ranged build.
quest.4D6C3ED87414B7D1.quest_desc3: This tier of bow only allows for a single upgrade, the &aPotion Arrow Upgrade&r. This allows for your arrows to apply potion effects.
quest.4D6C3ED87414B7D1.title: &fFerricore Bow
quest.4D8644BC9308E349.title: &f物品接口
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc1: The &dArc Furnace&r is a massive machine used to quickly alloy metals and smelt ores.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc11: The top three slots are for &dGraphite Electrodes&r, which will degrade with use.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc13: The twelve left slots are for item inputs, with the temperature bars representing the smelting progress of each individual item.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc15: The button in the top left changes whether items are spread across the twelve slots or not.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc17: The four right slots are for additive materials that can be used for certain recipes.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc21: Input and additives are inserted through the left and right hatches at the top of the structure.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc23: The bottom slot in the back will output slag, and the front one will output the main process.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc25: Energy can be inserted through the three connectors at the back.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc3: The &dArc Furnace&r can smelt batches of many items at once at the cost of larger amounts of power.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc5: The next pages break down the &dArc Furnace's&r interface and automation.
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.quest_desc7: Make sure to check out the &bEngineer's Manual&r to help you build the multiblock!
quest.4DABDC2484C732AC.title: &dArc Furnace
quest.4DAE859CAD8DA492.quest_desc1: I have to activate that &dRift Portal&r. It's my only way off of this planet.
quest.4DAE859CAD8DA492.quest_desc3: These monsters just keep coming. With every one defeated, the Rift seems to stabilize a little more.
quest.4DAE859CAD8DA492.quest_desc5: If I can just last a little longer, I can active the portal using this fluid I've made.
quest.4DAE859CAD8DA492.quest_desc7: &6&o&nTASK&r: Survive the &dEndless Waves&r and activate the &5Rift Portal&r.
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.quest_desc1: Some &bRituals&r require the &bSacrifice&r of a living being to provide the necessary energy to summon the &bSpirit&r.
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.quest_desc3: To perform a &bSacrifice&r, kill an animal within 8 blocks of the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.quest_desc5: Only kills by players count as &bSacrifice&r.
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.title: &bSacrifices In Rituals
quest.4DD685A3F0F1329F.quest_desc1: Although there is a pre-programmed &5Collector Drone&r, this quest will show you how to make one for yourself!
